analyzed: de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don bsgrubs nas mjug bsdu ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Having thus established the intended meaning, in order to summarize, it is said:

original: de'i phyir dmigs su rung ba'i bdag nyid res 'ga' ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs su rung ba'i bdag nyid res 'ga' ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the object of apprehension is sometimes existent and sometimes not.

original: gang gi phyir des na mi rtag pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir des na mi rtag pa yin la /
translated: Because of that, it is impermanent.

original: mi rtag pa yang ci ltar sa bon gyi rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su byed pa'i myu gu sa bon gyi 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang ci ltar sa bon gyi rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su byed pa'i myu gu sa bon gyi 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as a sprout is the effect of a seed because it follows after and reverts with the seed,

original: dmigs su rung ba'i bdag 'di yang skyes bu'i byed pa gnas dang byed pa phrad pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can yin te /
analyzed: dmigs su rung ba'i bdag 'di yang skyes bu'i byed pa gnas dang byed pa phrad pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can yin te /
translated: so too this observable self follows after and reverts with the person‚Äôs action and the contact of the action with its basis.

original: des na skyes bu'i byed pas bskyed pa skyes bus byas pa skyes bu las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: des na skyes bu'i byed pas bskyed pa skyes bus byas pa skyes bu las byung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is generated by the person‚Äôs action, it is created by the person, and it arises from the person.

original: de'i phyir sgra 'di ni res 'ga' ba dang skyes bu'i byed pa rjes su byed pa yin pas na mi rtag pa dang skyes bus byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra 'di ni res 'ga' ba dang skyes bu'i byed pa rjes su byed pa yin pas na mi rtag pa dang skyes bus byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since this sound is sometimes produced and it follows after the person‚Äôs action, it is impermanent and created by the person.üîΩIf it were permanent, it would not express meaning.

original: gal te rtag par gyur na ni don rjod par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes 'chad pa ni de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te rtag par gyur na ni don rjod par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes 'chad pa ni de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the phrase ‚ÄúIf it were otherwise.‚Äù

original: rtag pa nyid yin na ni med na mi 'byung bar 'brel ba med pa'i phyir sgra dag las don rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid yin na ni med na mi 'byung bar 'brel ba med pa'i phyir sgra dag las don rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were permanent, then it would not be related to the non-existence of the object, and therefore the object would not be understood from the words.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni sdud @222b par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni sdud @222b par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnd‚Äù means ‚Äúin addition.‚Äù

original: rtag pa ni 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ni 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: The permanent is not the effect.

original: sgra'i bdag nyid ni don las gzhan pa yang yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i bdag nyid ni don las gzhan pa yang yin te /
translated: The nature of the word is also different from the object.

original: des na de'i bdag nyid kyis 'brel pa yang med do //
analyzed: des na de'i bdag nyid kyis 'brel pa yang med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no relation by identity.

original: des na 'brel pa gnyis ka med pa na don gzhan gyis don gzhan rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'brel pa gnyis ka med pa na don gzhan gyis don gzhan rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, when there is no relation in either way, the other object is not understood from the other object.

original: 'di snyam du sgra ni ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid 'brel pa las don go bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sgra ni ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid 'brel pa las don go bar byed pa yin la /
translated: If you think that the word is the cause of the understanding of the object by the relation of identity,

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kyang yod pa nyid do snyam na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kyang yod pa nyid do snyam na /
translated: and that identity exists,

original: sgra'i yod pa nyid ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: sgra'i yod pa nyid ni zhes smos te /
translated: then it is said that the existence of the word

original: don gyi khyad par khyad par can gyi don de la yod pa ngo bo nyid kyis 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don gyi khyad par khyad par can gyi don de la yod pa ngo bo nyid kyis 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: is not related by identity to the object that has the particular object as its meaning.

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
translated: The reason is stated:

original: yod pa de ni don thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa de ni don thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that existence is not differentiated with respect to any object.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: sgra'i ngo bo grub zin pa ni don la ltos pa'i rang bzhin cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: sgra'i ngo bo grub zin pa ni don la ltos pa'i rang bzhin cung zad kyang med do //
translated: The nature of the word, once it has been established, does not depend on any object.

original: des na sgra yod pa zhes bya ba de tsam gyis don rtogs pa na yod pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: des na sgra yod pa zhes bya ba de tsam gyis don rtogs pa na yod pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, when one understands the object by the mere word ‚Äúexists,‚Äù since there is no difference in existence, one would understand all objects.

original: khyad par can gyi don rtogs par yang mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi don rtogs par yang mthong ba yin no //
translated: But we see that one understands a particular object.

original: de'i phyir don gyi khyad par dang 'brel pa yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi khyad par dang 'brel pa yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the word is related to a particular object.

original: de yang tha dad pa'i don gyi de las skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan can nyid de rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang tha dad pa'i don gyi de las skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan can nyid de rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is the reason why it arises from a different object, because there is no other way.

original: 'di snyam du ji ltar yul las skyes pa ma yin pa'i dbang pos khyad par can gyi don rtogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du ji ltar yul las skyes pa ma yin pa'i dbang pos khyad par can gyi don rtogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúHow does the sense faculty, which does not arise from an object, cause one to understand a particular object?‚Äù

original: dbang po ni khyad par can gyi don la shes pa skyed par rung ba'i phyir dang / don kyang khyad par can gyi dbang pos gzung bar rung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po ni khyad par can gyi don la shes pa skyed par rung ba'i phyir dang / don kyang khyad par can gyi dbang pos gzung bar rung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sense faculty is suitable to generate a consciousness of a specific object, and because the object is suitable to be apprehended by a specific sense faculty.

original: dbang po dang yul gzhan du sgra dang don dag kyang phan tshun rung ba nyid nges par byed pa yin no //üîΩdon ni yul nyid kyis khyad par can gyi sgras rtogs par rung ba yin la /
analyzed: dbang po dang yul gzhan du sgra dang don dag kyang phan tshun rung ba nyid nges par byed pa yin no // don ni yul nyid kyis khyad par can gyi sgras rtogs par rung ba yin la /
translated: Sound and meaning are also mutually suitable in other sense faculties and objects.üîΩThe object is suitable to be understood by a specific sound through being the object.

original: sgra yang yul can nyid kyis khyad par can gyi don rtogs par rung ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra yang yul can nyid kyis khyad par can gyi don rtogs par rung ba yin no //
translated: The sound is suitable to understand a specific object through being the subject.

original: de dag gi rung ba nyid ni yul can nyid du nges par byed pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba'i dogs pa bsu nas /
analyzed: de dag gi rung ba nyid ni yul can nyid du nges par byed pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba'i dogs pa bsu nas /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúAre they suitable through being the object and subject?‚Äù

original: ma yin te zhes smos so //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes smos so //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù

original: yul dang dbang po de las yang dbang po'i yul gcig la so sor nges pa gang yin pa'i nges pa de ni don de las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mtshan can yin te /
analyzed: yul dang dbang po de las yang dbang po'i yul gcig la so sor nges pa gang yin pa'i nges pa de ni don de las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mtshan can yin te /
translated: From the object and sense faculty, the sense faculty‚Äôs object is ascertained as individual. That ascertainment is characterized by a cause that arises from that object.

original: dbang po'i don de la nges pa ni des bskyed pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po'i don de la nges pa ni des bskyed pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The certainty of the object of the sense faculty is the reason for its production.

original: 'di nyid ston pa ni yul des phan btags pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ston pa ni yul des phan btags pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is what is being taught: ‚ÄúThe object is helpful to the sense faculty.‚Äù

original: gdon mi za bar 'di de ltar khas blang dgos ste /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'di de ltar khas blang dgos ste /
translated: This must be accepted without doubt.

original: de ma yin na yul phan 'dogs pa ma yin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ma yin na yul phan 'dogs pa ma yin par 'gyur la /
translated: Otherwise, the object would not be helpful.

original: phan mi 'dogs pa de ni dbang pos ltos par bya bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: phan mi 'dogs pa de ni dbang pos ltos par bya bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: And that which is not helpful would not be related to the sense faculty,

original: @223a * // yul gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: @223a * // yul gzhan bzhin no //
translated: like another object.

original: dper na sgras ma byas pa'i mig sgra la mi ltos pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgras ma byas pa'i mig sgra la mi ltos pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the eye, which is not produced by sound, does not depend on sound.

original: de bzhin du gzugs la yang mi ltos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs la yang mi ltos par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, it would not depend on form.

original: skyes bu nyi ma nas grib mar zhugs pa'i mig gi dbang po ni gzugs la ltos pa yang yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu nyi ma nas grib mar zhugs pa'i mig gi dbang po ni gzugs la ltos pa yang yin te /
translated: The eye faculty of a person who has entered the shade from the sun does depend on form,

original: de la gsal ba'i rdzas kyis nyams pa'i dbang po gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa dag gis 'du bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la gsal ba'i rdzas kyis nyams pa'i dbang po gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa dag gis 'du bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the eye faculty is impaired by the substance of the light, and form, light, and attention are the causes of its activity.

original: des na des legs par byas pa de la shes pa skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na des legs par byas pa de la shes pa skyed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the eye is the cause of the arising of the visual consciousness.

original: gal te phan tshun 'dogs pa dang bral ba'i mig la sogs pa phan tshun nye bar 'du ba'i rgyu las skyes pa dag las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba na /
analyzed: gal te phan tshun 'dogs pa dang bral ba'i mig la sogs pa phan tshun nye bar 'du ba'i rgyu las skyes pa dag las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba na /
translated: If the visual consciousness arises from the eye, etc., which are mutually unassociated, but which are the cause of mutual association,

original: de la dbang po'i yul gyis phan btags pa zhes bya ba gang yin /
analyzed: de la dbang po'i yul gyis phan btags pa zhes bya ba gang yin /
translated: what is called the assistance of the object of the faculty?

original: 'on kyang thag ring po na gnas pa'i gzugs kyis dbang po la phan 'dogs pa des na rtag tu dbang po la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on kyang thag ring po na gnas pa'i gzugs kyis dbang po la phan 'dogs pa des na rtag tu dbang po la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the form that exists at a distance assists the faculty, then it would always assist the faculty.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not reasonable,

original: thag ring bo na gnas pa'i gzugs kyang gzung bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thag ring bo na gnas pa'i gzugs kyang gzung bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that the form that exists at a distance would be apprehended.

original: 'on te gzugs kyi skad cig gang gi rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i gzugs skyed pa de nyid kyis dbang po la phan par byed pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te gzugs kyi skad cig gang gi rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i gzugs skyed pa de nyid kyis dbang po la phan par byed pa yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the form that produces the form that exists in the proper place assists the faculty,üîΩthen that is not reasonable,üîΩbecause it follows that the form that exists at a distance would be apprehended.

original: de lta na ni 'o na gtan tshigs thigs par phan tshun ltos pa med pa dag kyang shes pa bskyed par nus par bshad pa de 'dir 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na gtan tshigs thigs par phan tshun ltos pa med pa dag kyang shes pa bskyed par nus par bshad pa de 'dir 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, then the statement in the Drop of Reasons that ‚Äúeven things that are not mutually dependent can generate consciousness‚Äù would be contradicted here.

original: phyogs 'di ni rigs pa yang ma yin te ;
analyzed: phyogs 'di ni rigs pa yang ma yin te ;
translated: This position is also unreasonable.

original: 'di ltar sa la sogs pa dang lhan cig pa'i sa bon gyis myu gu skye ba dang mthun pa'i khyad par dang po skyed par byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar sa la sogs pa dang lhan cig pa'i sa bon gyis myu gu skye ba dang mthun pa'i khyad par dang po skyed par byed de /
translated: Thus, a seed together with earth, etc., generates the first unique effect that is compatible with the arising of a sprout.

original: de la sa bon ni khyad par dang po skyed pa sal sogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa nyid yin mod kyi de dag gis phan 'dogs par byed pa ni med do //
analyzed: de la sa bon ni khyad par dang po skyed pa sal sogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa nyid yin mod kyi de dag gis phan 'dogs par byed pa ni med do //
translated: Although a seed is dependent on the cooperative conditions of earth, etc., in generating the first unique effect, it does not assist them.

original: de bzhin du mig gi dbang po yang yul gyis phan ma btags par yang rnam par shes bskyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi dbang po yang yul gyis phan ma btags par yang rnam par shes bskyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, even without being assisted by objects, the eye faculty generates consciousness.

original: phan 'dogs pa med pa dag la ci ltar ltos she na /
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa med pa dag la ci ltar ltos she na /
translated: How can it depend on those that do not assist it?

original: ltos pa ni cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: ltos pa ni cung zad kyang med do //
translated: It does not depend on them at all.

original: 'on kyang nye bar 'du ba'i rgyu kho na las sa bon gyi myu gu skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par dang po skyed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang nye bar 'du ba'i rgyu kho na las sa bon gyi myu gu skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par dang po skyed pa yin la /
translated: However, the sprout of a seed arises only from the assembly of causes and conditions, and it is generated by a specific nature that is concordant with its cause.

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni rgyu med pas de'i rang bzhin med pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni rgyu med pas de'i rang bzhin med pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: But at other times, since there is no cause, it is simply nonexistent.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar tshogs pa'i rgyu kho na las rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar tshogs pa'i rgyu kho na las rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin te /
translated: In the same way, here too, the specific nature of a sprout arises only from the assembly of causes and conditions.

original: des na 'di ni lung dang 'gal ba dang rigs pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di ni lung dang 'gal ba dang rigs pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore this is contradictory to scripture and reasoning.üîΩNƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds:

original: bshad pa / 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This demonstrates the following.

original: 'bras bus 'ga' zhig skyed pa @223b na gang gis gang la res 'ga' yang rang gi ngo bo'i phan gdags dgos pa de ni res 'ga' de nyid kyis phan btags nas 'bras bu de byed pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: 'bras bus 'ga' zhig skyed pa @223b na gang gis gang la res 'ga' yang rang gi ngo bo'i phan gdags dgos pa de ni res 'ga' de nyid kyis phan btags nas 'bras bu de byed pa yin pa'am /
translated: If something is produced by a result, it must sometimes be benefited by its own nature. That is, sometimes it is benefited by that very result and then it produces the result.

original: phan ma btags na ni nye bar tshogs pa'i rgyu dag las khyad par du 'grub pa de nyid kyis byed pa yin te /
analyzed: phan ma btags na ni nye bar tshogs pa'i rgyu dag las khyad par du 'grub pa de nyid kyis byed pa yin te /
translated: If it does not benefit, then the special cause that is the collection of causes itself acts to produce it.

original: dper na skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni zhing la sogs pas phan btags pa'i sa bon myu gu skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i khyad par skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: dper na skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni zhing la sogs pas phan btags pa'i sa bon myu gu skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i khyad par skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: For example, in the second moment and so on, the seed produces a sprout that is a special result through the benefit of the field and so on.

original: skad cig ma dang po la ni nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyu dag kho na las khyad par can du grub pas de dag dang lhan cig tu khyad par dang po skyed par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po la ni nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyu dag kho na las khyad par can du grub pas de dag dang lhan cig tu khyad par dang po skyed par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: In the first moment, it is established as a special result from the collection of causes alone, and it produces the first special result simultaneously with them.

original: gdon mi za bar sa bon gyis la sogs pas phan gdags par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs par khas blang dgos pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar sa bon gyis la sogs pas phan gdags par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs par khas blang dgos pa de bzhin du /
translated: Undoubtedly, the special nature of the seed and so on that is to be benefited must be accepted as arising from its own continuum of causes.

original: dbang po'i yul gyi khyad par gyis phan gdags par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par yang rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs par khas blang par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i yul gyi khyad par gyis phan gdags par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par yang rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las 'ongs par khas blang par bya'o //
translated: The difference in the nature of the object to be benefited by the difference in the object of the sense faculty must be accepted as coming from its own antecedent cause.

original: de yang res 'ga' ni yul gyis sad par byed la /
analyzed: de yang res 'ga' ni yul gyis sad par byed la /
translated: And that is sometimes activated by the object,

original: res 'ga' ni nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyus yin gyi /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyus yin gyi /
translated: and sometimes by the cause of the collection.

original: rtag pa'i dngos po la ni nges pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa'i dngos po la ni nges pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no certainty at all in a permanent entity.

original: gdon mi za bar de khas blang dgos te /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar de khas blang dgos te /
translated: One must certainly accept that,

original: de lta ma yin na phyogs dang phyogs su phan mi 'dogs pa la ltos pa med do zhes brjod pa de mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na phyogs dang phyogs su phan mi 'dogs pa la ltos pa med do zhes brjod pa de mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise, it would be untenable to say that it does not depend on the absence of benefit in different directions.

original: sa bon gyi khyad par dang po skyed pa la ni sa la sogs pa la ltos pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sa bon gyi khyad par dang po skyed pa la ni sa la sogs pa la ltos pa yin gyi /
translated: In the production of the first difference in the seed, it depends on earth, etc.

original: de dag gis phan gdags pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de dag gis phan gdags pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: But there is no benefit at all from them.

original: de'i phyir bsam pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsam pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the intended meaning:

original: rtag pa'i dngos po ni ltos par mi 'thad kyi /
analyzed: rtag pa'i dngos po ni ltos par mi 'thad kyi /
translated: It is not tenable that a permanent entity depends on something else.

original: rtag pa ni phan tshun 'du ba'i rgyu la ltos pas de la ltos pa'am /
analyzed: rtag pa ni phan tshun 'du ba'i rgyu la ltos pas de la ltos pa'am /
translated: Permanence is dependent on the cause of mutual contact, orüîΩit is dependent on the arising of a specific nature from that.

original: de las rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par skyes pa de'i phyir de la ltos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no //
analyzed: de las rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par skyes pa de'i phyir de la ltos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: gal te des phan gdags par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dbang po de la phan pa yin no /
analyzed: gal te des phan gdags par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dbang po de la phan pa yin no /
translated: If it is helpful to that sense faculty by the nature of being that which is to be benefited,

original: ci'i phyir yul gcig bu de kho nas phan 'dogs par byed ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yul gcig bu de kho nas phan 'dogs par byed ce na /
translated: why is it helpful only by that object alone?

original: de las de brgal zhing brtag pa de la dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid lan 'debs par byed pa yin no ;
analyzed: de las de brgal zhing brtag pa de la dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid lan 'debs par byed pa yin no ;
translated: The answer to that objection is the nature of things themselves.

original: /'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: /'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gal te rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs pa can gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa dag kho bo cag gis rnam par gzhag par mi nus na ni /
analyzed: gal te rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs pa can gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa dag kho bo cag gis rnam par gzhag par mi nus na ni /
translated: If we cannot posit a variety of natures that have a variety of causes,

original: gzhan gyis brgal zhing brtag par bya ba nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyis brgal zhing brtag par bya ba nyid yin gyi /
translated: then we would be open to objection and analysis.üîΩBut if we can posit a variety of natures that have a variety of causes,üîΩthen we are not open to objection and analysis.

original: ci'i phyir dngos po 'di rgyu 'di las skyes pa yin zhes de ltar ni kho bo cag la dri bar mi bya @224a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir dngos po 'di rgyu 'di las skyes pa yin zhes de ltar ni kho bo cag la dri bar mi bya @224a * //
translated: One should not ask us, ‚ÄúWhy does this thing arise from this cause?‚Äù

original: ste ; gang zhig rang gi rgyu dag las de lta bur gyur pa'i sa la sogs pas sa bon la sogs pa la ci'i phyir phan 'dogs shes pa la sogs pa nyid la 'dri bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ste ; gang zhig rang gi rgyu dag las de lta bur gyur pa'i sa la sogs pas sa bon la sogs pa la ci'i phyir phan 'dogs shes pa la sogs pa nyid la 'dri bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Rather, one should ask the seed, etc., ‚ÄúWhy do you, having become such and such through your own causes, assist the seed, etc.?‚Äù

original: de nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The meaning of this is taught by ‚ÄúIn this way‚Äù:

original: de thams cad kyis ni don 'di ltar bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de thams cad kyis ni don 'di ltar bstan pa yin te /
translated: All of this teaches the following:

original: de kho na sems par byed pas ni dngos po rnams rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu tha dad pa dang ldan par rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin gyi /üîΩrgyu mtshan 'dis na 'di las ni mi skye'i /
analyzed: de kho na sems par byed pas ni dngos po rnams rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu tha dad pa dang ldan par rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin gyi / rgyu mtshan 'dis na 'di las ni mi skye'i /
translated: One who is reflecting on reality should posit things as having causes and as having different causes.

original: gzhan las skye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni skyes bus bsam par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan las skye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni skyes bus bsam par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But this meaning, ‚ÄúThis does not arise from that cause, it arises from another,‚Äù is not something to be reflected on by a person.

original: ci ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba bzhin ni //üîΩde'i phyir gang zhig gang dang lhan cig byed par so sor nges pa de ni res 'ga' des phan gdags par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: ci ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba bzhin ni // de'i phyir gang zhig gang dang lhan cig byed par so sor nges pa de ni res 'ga' des phan gdags par bya ba yin la /
translated: Just as it is said, ‚ÄúThe dependent origination is inconceivable.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, it is the case that whatever is fixed to work together with something else is sometimes benefited by it, and sometimes it is the cause of its collection.

original: res 'ga' ni nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyus yin no zhes bya ba ni de kho na'i don yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyus yin no zhes bya ba ni de kho na'i don yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of that statement.

original: de bzhin du gal te sgra rnams kyang res 'ga' don las skye ba yin na ni dbang po bzhin du de la rung ba nyid so so bar 'gyur ba yin no //üîΩde las skye ba nyid med na ni don gyi khyad par dang 'brel par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te sgra rnams kyang res 'ga' don las skye ba yin na ni dbang po bzhin du de la rung ba nyid so so bar 'gyur ba yin no // de las skye ba nyid med na ni don gyi khyad par dang 'brel par mi 'gyur la /
translated: In the same way, if sometimes sounds are produced from objects, then they would be fit for that, like the sense faculty.üîΩIf they are not produced from that, then they would not be related to the particular object.

original: de las kyang khyad par rtogs par byed pa nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang khyad par rtogs par byed pa nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: And if they are not produced from that, then they would not be the cause of the understanding of the particular object.

original: de med na ste de las skye ba med na ni 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa'i yul can gyi shes pa med par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de med na ste de las skye ba med na ni 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa'i yul can gyi shes pa med par 'gyur la /
translated: If it does not exist, i.e., if it is not produced from that, then the expression ‚Äúthis is that‚Äù would not be a cognition that has as its object the connection between the expressed and the expresser.

original: yul can med na de'i yul 'brel pa'i dngos po la yang med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: yul can med na de'i yul 'brel pa'i dngos po la yang med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: If the subject does not exist, then the object, the thing that is connected, would not exist.

original: don las ma skyes na ni 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'thad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: don las ma skyes na ni 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'thad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: If it is not produced from the object, not only is the connection ‚Äúthis is that‚Äù not tenable,

original: sgra rnams don dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra rnams don dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: but also the words would not be connected with the object.

original: don med par 'gyur ba de nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: don med par 'gyur ba de nyid ston pa ni /
translated: He shows just that, that the object would not exist:

original: don las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: don las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: From the object, etc.

original: re zhig don las ni mthong ba skye ba yin no //
analyzed: re zhig don las ni mthong ba skye ba yin no //
translated: First, seeing is produced from the object.

original: mthong ba las de ston par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba las de ston par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: From seeing, one desires to show that.

original: 'dod pa des ni don shes pa'i phyir yul de la rab tu sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa des ni don shes pa'i phyir yul de la rab tu sbyor ba yin te /
translated: By that desire, one applies to the object in order to know the object.

original: brda nyid du rab tu sbyor ro //
analyzed: brda nyid du rab tu sbyor ro //
translated: One applies it as a conventional symbol.

original: don de dang de dag la brdar byas pa'i sgra ni don des de dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: don de dang de dag la brdar byas pa'i sgra ni don des de dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The sound that is used as a conventional symbol for this or that object is endowed with that object.

original: dper na don mthong nas don bstan par 'dod pa na mig 'jums pa la sogs pa lus kyi bya ba brdar bya bar nus pa des na de don dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na don mthong nas don bstan par 'dod pa na mig 'jums pa la sogs pa lus kyi bya ba brdar bya bar nus pa des na de don dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, when one sees an object and wishes to indicate it, one is able to use a bodily action, such as pointing with the finger, and thereby one is endowed with the object.

original: de ltar dngos po rtag pa ni 'dod pas brdar bya ba nus pa ma yin no //üîΩdngos po gang zhig 'dod pas rang bzhin @224b nam /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po rtag pa ni 'dod pas brdar bya ba nus pa ma yin no // dngos po gang zhig 'dod pas rang bzhin @224b nam /
translated: But it is not possible to use a conventional symbol for a permanent thing, because one does not desire it.

original: gnas skabs gzhan du bsgrub par nus pa de ni brdar bya nus pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs gzhan du bsgrub par nus pa de ni brdar bya nus pa yin no //
translated: That object which one desires and which one is able to bring about in another state is one for which a conventional symbol can be used.

original: brda zhes bya ba ni rang gi bsam ba ston pa'i mtshan ma nges par sbyor ba yin te //
analyzed: brda zhes bya ba ni rang gi bsam ba ston pa'i mtshan ma nges par sbyor ba yin te //
translated: A conventional symbol is the application of a sign that indicates one‚Äôs own thought.

original: des na snang ba'i dngos po gang zhig skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i rang bzhin de ni rang gi bsam pa'i dus su de'i dbang gis bskyed pa'am bkod pa'i phyir de mtshon par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na snang ba'i dngos po gang zhig skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i rang bzhin de ni rang gi bsam pa'i dus su de'i dbang gis bskyed pa'am bkod pa'i phyir de mtshon par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, any entity that appears and is by nature dependent on the desire of a person is indicated by that person‚Äôs intention because it is generated or arranged by the power of that intention.

original: rtsa'i tho la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsa'i tho la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: This is like a finger pointing to the moon.

original: rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa yin yang rung ste /
translated: Whether it is permanent or impermanent,

original: dngos po gang zhig skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa 'am ldog pa ma yin pa de ni gang las de mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyis don dang ldan bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: dngos po gang zhig skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa 'am ldog pa ma yin pa de ni gang las de mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyis don dang ldan bar 'gyur ba /
translated: any entity that does not engage or disengage by the power of a person‚Äôs intention is not related to the purpose of the person who desires it.

original: brda'i dus dang tha snyad kyi dus dang bar bar gyi gnas skabs su dus rtag tu rang bzhin gcig nyid kyis gnas pa'i phyir rnam pa gang gis bsam pa go bar byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: brda'i dus dang tha snyad kyi dus dang bar bar gyi gnas skabs su dus rtag tu rang bzhin gcig nyid kyis gnas pa'i phyir rnam pa gang gis bsam pa go bar byed par 'gyur /
translated: Because it always remains the same nature at all times, during the time of the convention of the sign and during the time of the convention of the word, in what way does it indicate the intention?

original: des na rtag gam mi rtag kyang bla ste /
analyzed: des na rtag gam mi rtag kyang bla ste /
translated: Therefore, whether it is permanent or impermanent, it is irrelevant.

original: dngos po gang zhig bsam pa'i rjes su mi byed pa de ni brdar bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po gang zhig bsam pa'i rjes su mi byed pa de ni brdar bya bar mi nus so //
translated: That which does not follow after an object cannot be a conventional symbol.

original: 'brel pa dngos po la yod kyang brda ni 'brel pa gsal bar byed par 'dod par yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa dngos po la yod kyang brda ni 'brel pa gsal bar byed par 'dod par yin no //
translated: Even though the connection exists in the object, the conventional symbol is asserted to make the connection clear.

original: des na 'di ni don 'di bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di ni don 'di bstan pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning of the statement:

original: rtag pa ni dngos po'i 'brel pa gsal bar byed pa'i brda ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rtag pa ni dngos po'i 'brel pa gsal bar byed pa'i brda ma yin zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is permanent is not a conventional symbol that makes the connection in the object clear.

original: brda tsam du byas pa yang yin te /
analyzed: brda tsam du byas pa yang yin te /
translated: It is also not a conventional symbol that is made.

original: de ni brdar bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni brdar bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it cannot be made into a conventional symbol.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /üîΩdon de las byung ba skye ba yod pa ma yin pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni don de rtogs par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa / don de las byung ba skye ba yod pa ma yin pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni don de rtogs par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said:üîΩ‚ÄúThose that do not arise from that object do not make that object known.‚Äù

original: gang zhig don gang las ma byung ba de brda la ltos nas de rtogs par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig don gang las ma byung ba de brda la ltos nas de rtogs par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: That which does not arise from an object is not a cause that makes that object known in dependence on a conventional symbol.

original: dper na bum pa la sogs pa de dag las byung ba ma yin pa'i nam mkha' de rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa la sogs pa de dag las byung ba ma yin pa'i nam mkha' de rtogs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, space, which does not arise from those objects such as a pot, is not known.

original: des na de dag las byung ba ma yin pa'i sgra rnams ni don gyi khyad par des don dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de dag las byung ba ma yin pa'i sgra rnams ni don gyi khyad par des don dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the words that do not arise from those do not have the meaning of that particular object.

original: 'di snyam du nges pa gang gi phyir sgra'i nges par byed pa de las skye bar 'gyur ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin ni don la nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di snyam du nges pa gang gi phyir sgra'i nges par byed pa de las skye bar 'gyur ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin ni don la nges pa ma yin no //
translated: If you think that the nature of the word that arises from the cause of the word is not ascertained in the object, because of the ascertainment of the object,

original: rang gi ngo bo nges pa nyid yin na ni skye ba las gzhan nges par byed pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nges pa nyid yin na ni skye ba las gzhan nges par byed pa med pa yin no //
translated: if the nature of the word is ascertained, there is no ascertainment other than arising.

original: gal te gang la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ba rang gi ngo bo nges pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te gang la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ba rang gi ngo bo nges pa ma yin na /
translated: If the nature of the word is not ascertained in that which is to be ascertained,

original: 'o na sgra'i nges pa ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na sgra'i nges pa ci yin zhe na /
translated: then what is the ascertainment of the word?

original: smras pa / shes par byed pa'i nus pa nges pa yin no //üîΩsgra'i rang gi ngo bo nges pa ma yin yang byed pa'i mtshan nyid don shes par byed pa'i nus @225a * //
analyzed: smras pa / shes par byed pa'i nus pa nges pa yin no // sgra'i rang gi ngo bo nges pa ma yin yang byed pa'i mtshan nyid don shes par byed pa'i nus @225a * //
translated: We say: The ascertainment is the power to make known.

original: pa nges pa yin no //
analyzed: pa nges pa yin no //
translated: Even though the nature of the word is not ascertained, the ascertainment is the power to make known the object, which is characterized by the action.

original: 'di skad du rang gi ngo bo don thams cad la khyad par med pa yin yang sgra rnams kyi nges pa ni rtogs par rung ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di skad du rang gi ngo bo don thams cad la khyad par med pa yin yang sgra rnams kyi nges pa ni rtogs par rung ba yin la /
translated: In other words, the nature of things is not differentiated, but the ascertainment of words is suitable to be understood.

original: de yang 'bras bu rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'bras bu rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the effect is to be inferred.

original: shes pa skyed par byed pa'i nus pa de nyid smras pa ni 'di ni 'di kho na'i rtogs par byed pa yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa skyed par byed pa'i nus pa de nyid smras pa ni 'di ni 'di kho na'i rtogs par byed pa yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The very capacity to generate cognition is said to be the cause of understanding this alone, not of understanding anything else.

original: gzhan dag de ltar dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gzhan dag de ltar dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to dispel others' doubts about this, it is explained:

original: yod pa dang med pa dag gis te /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa dag gis te /
translated: By existence and non-existence.

original: dngos po yod na de'i nus pa yod pa dang / med na med pa 'dis dngos po der 'brel pa de yang ngo //
analyzed: dngos po yod na de'i nus pa yod pa dang / med na med pa 'dis dngos po der 'brel pa de yang ngo //
translated: When a thing exists, its capacity exists, and when it does not exist, it does not exist. This shows that the thing is related to that.

original: gal te sgra rtag pa nyid yin na de'i rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa yang rtag pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te sgra rtag pa nyid yin na de'i rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa yang rtag pa ma yin nam /
translated: If sound is permanent, is not its capacity to produce understanding also permanent?

original: de ltar yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed ce na /
analyzed: de ltar yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed ce na /
translated: In that case, how can it conform to existence and non-existence?

original: bden mod kyi 'on kyang nus pa de don shes par byed pa na /
analyzed: bden mod kyi 'on kyang nus pa de don shes par byed pa na /
translated: True, but when the capacity is made known by the object,

original: gal te don des phan gdags par bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te don des phan gdags par bya ba ma yin na /
translated: if the object does not benefit it,

original: des don shes pa nges pa nyid du byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des don shes pa nges pa nyid du byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it will not definitely make known the object.

original: des na don de la ltos pas de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nus pa ni de'i 'bras bu yin no //üîΩdngos po gzhan dag la yang 'bras bu gang yin pa de'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na don de la ltos pas de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nus pa ni de'i 'bras bu yin no // dngos po gzhan dag la yang 'bras bu gang yin pa de'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because it depends on the object, the capacity that conforms with its presence and absence is its effect.üîΩBecause the definition of an effect in other things is merely that it conforms with presence and absence.

original: gzhan du yang yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa tsam 'bras bu yin la /
analyzed: gzhan du yang yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa tsam 'bras bu yin la /
translated: In other cases, the effect is merely the conformity with presence and absence.

original: de ni 'dir yang ma tshang ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'dir yang ma tshang ba med pa yin te /
translated: And that is not lacking here.

original: des ni 'bras bu nyid las ma 'das so //
analyzed: des ni 'bras bu nyid las ma 'das so //
translated: Therefore, it does not go beyond being an effect.

original: gal te yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu de las 'das na ni nges pa nyid med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu de las 'das na ni nges pa nyid med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it goes beyond that effect, which is defined as conforming with presence and absence, then it would not be definite.

original: gzhan yang gal te nus pa nges na rang gi ngo bo nyid nges pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te nus pa nges na rang gi ngo bo nyid nges pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, if the potentiality is ascertained, then its own nature is ascertained,

original: nus pa ni rang bzhin las don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: nus pa ni rang bzhin las don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because the potentiality is not a different object from the nature.

original: / don gzhan nyid yin par khas len na ni nus pa de nyid las don rnams la shes pa skye ba'i phyir nus pa de nyid rjod byed yin par 'gyur gyi sgam yin no //
analyzed: / don gzhan nyid yin par khas len na ni nus pa de nyid las don rnams la shes pa skye ba'i phyir nus pa de nyid rjod byed yin par 'gyur gyi sgam yin no //
translated: If one accepts that it is a different object, then consciousness arises from that potentiality alone with regard to the object, so that potentiality itself would be the expression.

original: 'di snyam du sgra dang 'brel pa'i nus pa brjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir sgra rjod par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sgra dang 'brel pa'i nus pa brjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir sgra rjod par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If one thinks in this way, ‚ÄúSound is the expression because the potentiality associated with sound is the expression,‚Äù

original: de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: then the root text declares, ‚ÄúThat is not so.‚Äù

original: tha dad pa'i phyogs la nus pa 'di ni sgra de'i yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i phyogs la nus pa 'di ni sgra de'i yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'grub ste /
translated: In the position of difference, the connection ‚ÄúThis potentiality is of that sound‚Äù is not established,

original: sgra rtag ba nyid kyis nus pa'i rgyu nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / nus pas kyang phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra rtag ba nyid kyis nus pa'i rgyu nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / nus pas kyang phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not tenable that sound is the cause of potentiality due to its permanence, and because potentiality does not benefit it.

original: gang gi phyir nus pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir brjod par bya ba'am gsal bar bya ba 'am gzung bar @225b bya ba'i yul 'ga' zhig tu nges pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid gang yin pa de thams cad ni rang gi rgyu ngo
analyzed: gang gi phyir nus pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir brjod par bya ba'am gsal bar bya ba 'am gzung bar @225b bya ba'i yul 'ga' zhig tu nges pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid gang yin pa de thams cad ni rang gi rgyu ngo
translated: Because potency is not different from its own nature, therefore whatever nature is ascertained as an object to be expressed, manifested, or apprehended, all of that is the nature of its own cause.

original: bo nyid rang bzhin las byung ba yin pas so //
analyzed: bo nyid rang bzhin las byung ba yin pas so //
translated: It arises from its own nature.

original: nges par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i yul te /
analyzed: nges par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i yul te /
translated: Ascertaining is the object of ascertainment.

original: gang zhig yul gang la nges par 'dod pa'i yul des nges pa'i don de la phan gdags par bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: gang zhig yul gang la nges par 'dod pa'i yul des nges pa'i don de la phan gdags par bya ba nyid de /
translated: Whatever object is asserted to be ascertained, that object ascertains the meaning of that which is to be benefited.

original: de lta ma yin na ci ltar de la nges par 'gyur gyi gzhan la ni ma yin /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ci ltar de la nges par 'gyur gyi gzhan la ni ma yin /
translated: Otherwise, how could it be ascertained in that way, but not in another?

original: gal te me'i bud shing sreg pa'i nus pa dang sgron me gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa yul nges pa yin yang gsal bar bya ba'i don nam /
analyzed: gal te me'i bud shing sreg pa'i nus pa dang sgron me gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa yul nges pa yin yang gsal bar bya ba'i don nam /
translated: If the fuel of fire has the potency to burn and the lamp has the potency to illuminate, although the object is ascertained, the object to be manifested

original: bsreg par bya bas sgron ma dang me bskyed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du rang gi tshogs pa las don 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig la nges par skye ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bsreg par bya bas sgron ma dang me bskyed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du rang gi tshogs pa las don 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig la nges par skye ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Just as a lamp and fire do not generate each other, so too some object definitely arises from some collection.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: 'di ltar don 'ga' zhig rang gi rgyu de las 'bras bu 'ga' zhig byed nus par skyes pa yin gyi 'bras bu des bskyed par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar don 'ga' zhig rang gi rgyu de las 'bras bu 'ga' zhig byed nus par skyes pa yin gyi 'bras bu des bskyed par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, some object arises from its cause as something able to produce some effect, but it is not produced by that effect.

original: rgyu rnams khyad par can gyi 'bras bu byed pa'i dngos po skyed pa la 'gal ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu rnams khyad par can gyi 'bras bu byed pa'i dngos po skyed pa la 'gal ba med pa yin no //
translated: There is no contradiction in a cause generating an effect that is a special thing.

original: des na rgyu'i 'bras bu byed pa'i nus pa ni nges pa'i yul can yin la /
analyzed: des na rgyu'i 'bras bu byed pa'i nus pa ni nges pa'i yul can yin la /
translated: Therefore, the potency of a cause to produce an effect has a definite object.

original: yul gyis bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gyis bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not generated by the object.

original: sgron mas ni nus pa la sogs pa rang gi shes pa skyed par rung bar byas la /
analyzed: sgron mas ni nus pa la sogs pa rang gi shes pa skyed par rung bar byas la /
translated: A lamp makes the potency of fire and so on suitable to generate its own consciousness.

original: med kyang so sor nges pa'i shing sol par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: med kyang so sor nges pa'i shing sol par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Even though it does not generate fire, it makes fire definite.

original: dbang po dang sgra dang shes pa ni rang gi yul bskyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po dang sgra dang shes pa ni rang gi yul bskyed pa ma yin no //
translated: The sense faculty, sound, and consciousness do not generate their object.

original: dbang po ni de gang la shes pa bskyed par nges pa'i rang bzhin du 'dod cing /
analyzed: dbang po ni de gang la shes pa bskyed par nges pa'i rang bzhin du 'dod cing /
translated: The sense faculty is asserted to be the nature that definitely generates consciousness.

original: sgra rnams ni shes pa bskyed pa la shes pa ni 'dzin pa la so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: sgra rnams ni shes pa bskyed pa la shes pa ni 'dzin pa la so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: Sound is the nature that generates consciousness. Consciousness is the nature that individually ascertains the object.

original: des na dbang po la sogs pa la ni des phan pa bya dgos pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na dbang po la sogs pa la ni des phan pa bya dgos pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the sense faculty and so on must definitely benefit it.

original: gal te 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i yul rgyu nges pa'i skyed byed ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i yul rgyu nges pa'i skyed byed ma yin te /
translated: If the object called the effect is not the generator that definitely produces the cause,

original: de ni rgyu 'de nyid kyi nus pa nges pa las skyes pa 'di bzhin du /
analyzed: de ni rgyu 'de nyid kyi nus pa nges pa las skyes pa 'di bzhin du /
translated: then like this, it is generated from the definite power of that cause alone.

original: dbang po gsal bar bya ba yul dang shes pa'i gzung ba yang dbang bo dang shes pa skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po gsal bar bya ba yul dang shes pa'i gzung ba yang dbang bo dang shes pa skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The object that clarifies the sense faculty is also not the apprehender of consciousness, nor is the sense faculty and consciousness the generator of the object.

original: rang gi rgyu'i nus pa nges pa kho na las skyes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu'i nus pa nges pa kho na las skyes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: This is because it is generated from the definite power of its own cause alone.

original: 'di la nyi ma nas grib khang du zhugs pa'i dbang po ni rang gi rgyu nyid las de ltar skyes pa yin gyi de la mi ltos par ni rigs so zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di la nyi ma nas grib khang du zhugs pa'i dbang po ni rang gi rgyu nyid las de ltar skyes pa yin gyi de la mi ltos par ni rigs so zhes bshad zin to //
translated: In this regard, it has already been explained that the sense faculty that enters the shade from the sun is born in that way from its own cause, and it is not reasonable that it does not depend on that.

original: de'i phyir res 'ga' de las sam de nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyu las kyang ru ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir res 'ga' de las sam de nye bar tshogs par byed pa'i rgyu las kyang ru ste /
translated: Therefore, sometimes it is from that or from the cause that produces it in combination with that.

original: dbang po khyad par par na du gyur pa na de nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po khyad par par na du gyur pa na de nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When the sense faculty is damaged, it definitely changes.

original: dbang po bzhin du don gyi rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su byed pa'i shes pa la gal te don phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin na ni gzhan dag @226a * //
analyzed: dbang po bzhin du don gyi rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su byed pa'i shes pa la gal te don phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin na ni gzhan dag @226a * //
translated: If the object does not benefit the consciousness that conforms with the presence or absence of the object, like the sense faculty, then others

original: kyang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: kyang mi 'gyur te /
translated: would not be like that.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir 'bras bu las gzhan ltos par bya ba'i nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ni skyed par byed pa nyid yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir 'bras bu las gzhan ltos par bya ba'i nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ni skyed par byed pa nyid yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because there is no difference.üîΩTherefore, the reason for the certainty of dependence on something other than the effect is the cause of production.

original: de'i phyir gsal bar byed pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsal bar byed pa nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is the cause of manifestation,üîΩthe cause of apprehension,

original: 'dzin par byed pa nyid dam /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa nyid dam /
translated: Or, it is that which apprehends.üîΩ

original: rnam pa thams cad du sgra 'am shes par gyur pa'i nges pa nyid thams cad ni nges pa'i yul skyed par byed pa nyid du rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir nus pa nges pa zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid nges pa las gzhan ma
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du sgra 'am shes par gyur pa'i nges pa nyid thams cad ni nges pa'i yul skyed par byed pa nyid du rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir nus pa nges pa zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid nges pa las gzhan ma
translated: Because all ascertainment of sound or consciousness in every way is posited as the producer of the object of ascertainment, ascertainment of potentiality is not different from ascertainment of essence.

original: yin la / rgyus ma byas pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yin la / rgyus ma byas pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is also not unproduced.

original: gal te sgra'i don rtogs pa 'brel pa nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin na ni de'i tshe don dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / brda med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'i sgra rjod par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i don rtogs pa 'brel pa nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin na ni de'i tshe don dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / brda med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'i sgra rjod par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If the understanding of the meaning of a word is preceded by ascertainment of the relation, then at that time, because it would not be related to the meaning and because there would be no convention, a word that is not produced would not express.

original: de ltar na ni ma yin no zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na ni ma yin no zhes smras pa ni /
translated: But it is not like that.

original: gal te med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis sgra las don rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis sgra las don rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: If it is not so, then the understanding of the meaning from a word is not due to the fact that it does not occur without it.

original: 'on kyang sgron mas gzugs bzhin du rung ba nyid kyis sgra las don rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgron mas gzugs bzhin du rung ba nyid kyis sgra las don rtogs pa yin no //
translated: But rather, like a lamp, the understanding of the meaning from a word is due to its suitability.

original: des na 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'i sgra ni don go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon 'di med do zhe na /üîΩma yin te zhes smos te /
analyzed: des na 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'i sgra ni don go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon 'di med do zhe na / ma yin te zhes smos te /
translated: Therefore, since there is no relation, the objection does not apply that the sound that is not produced does not cause the understanding of the meaning.

original: gzugs la sgron ma bzhin du rang gi ngo bos don rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sgron ma bzhin du rang gi ngo bos don rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because, like a lamp, the sound does not cause the understanding of the meaning by its own nature.

original: gang zhig rung ba nyid kyis don rtogs par rung ba de ni nye bar bstan pa med par don go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig rung ba nyid kyis don rtogs par rung ba de ni nye bar bstan pa med par don go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is suitable to cause the understanding of the meaning by its suitability does not cause the understanding of the meaning without being taught,

original: dper na sgron ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgron ma bzhin no //
translated: like a lamp.

original: sgra ni de ltar nye bar bstan pa med par don go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni de ltar nye bar bstan pa med par don go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Sound does not cause the understanding of the meaning without being taught.

original: de'i phyir sgra dang rtags dag ni rtogs par bya ba'i don de yod pa dang med pa la go rims bzhin du mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de dag dran pa la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra dang rtags dag ni rtogs par bya ba'i don de yod pa dang med pa la go rims bzhin du mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de dag dran pa la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, sound and signs, respectively, are seen to depend on the memory of the existence and nonexistence of the object that is to be understood.

original: 'dis ni rtags dper brjod pa yin te dper na rtags mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la /üîΩmthong ba dang mi mthong ba de dag la ltos nas don gyis go bar byed pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'dis ni rtags dper brjod pa yin te dper na rtags mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la / mthong ba dang mi mthong ba de dag la ltos nas don gyis go bar byed pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: This is an example of a reason. For example, in the case of a reason, seeing and not seeing in the similar and dissimilar classes are respectively understood by implication.

original: sgra yang brjod par bya ba dang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dag la mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de dran pa la ltos nas rjod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra yang brjod par bya ba dang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dag la mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de dran pa la ltos nas rjod par byed pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, in the case of a word, seeing and not seeing in the case of what is and is not to be expressed are respectively understood by implication in dependence on memory.

original: mthong ba la ltos pa'i gtan tshigs su ma mthong ba dang zhes smos te /
analyzed: mthong ba la ltos pa'i gtan tshigs su ma mthong ba dang zhes smos te /
translated: In the case of a reason that depends on seeing, not seeing is mentioned.

original: gang zhig brjod par bya ba'i don la ma mthong ba'i sgra de las ni don mi rtogs pa'i phyir na sgra ni mthong ba la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig brjod par bya ba'i don la ma mthong ba'i sgra de las ni don mi rtogs pa'i phyir na sgra ni mthong ba la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Since one does not understand the meaning from a word that does not see the object to be expressed, a word depends on seeing.

original: yang mthong ba brjod pa dran pa med pa de la yang sgras rtogs pa byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang mthong ba brjod pa dran pa med pa de la yang sgras rtogs pa byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, a word does not cause one to understand what is seen but not expressed.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na mthong ba dran pa la @226b ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na mthong ba dran pa la @226b ltos pa yin no //
translated: For that reason, it depends on memory of what is seen.

original: ma mthong ba dran pa la ltos pa'i gtan tshigs smras pa /
analyzed: ma mthong ba dran pa la ltos pa'i gtan tshigs smras pa /
translated: The reason why one remembers what one has not seen is stated:

original: ma mthong ba the tshom za bar gyur na the tshom du 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir mthong ba med pa dran pa la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: ma mthong ba the tshom za bar gyur na the tshom du 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir mthong ba med pa dran pa la ltos pa yin no //
translated: If one doubts what one has not seen, then one doubts the reason. Therefore, not seeing depends on remembering.

original: brjod par bya ba las gzhan pa gang la mthong bar the tshom za ba de la ni ci sgra 'dis brjod par bya ba ma yin par yang the tshom za bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na ma mthong ba la yang ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba las gzhan pa gang la mthong bar the tshom za ba de la ni ci sgra 'dis brjod par bya ba ma yin par yang the tshom za bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na ma mthong ba la yang ltos pa yin no //
translated: If one doubts what one sees, then one doubts whether the object is expressed by that sound. Therefore, not seeing also depends on doubt.

original: gang gi phyir ma mthong ba la the tshom za na the tshom za bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ma mthong ba nyid med na yang the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma mthong ba la the tshom za na the tshom za bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ma mthong ba nyid med na yang the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: If one doubts what one has not seen, then one doubts not only that, but also that one has not seen it. To demonstrate this, it is said:

original: mang po mthong ba la ni the tshom du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
analyzed: mang po mthong ba la ni the tshom du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
translated: Because one doubts what one has seen many times.

original: gang gi tshe don mang po dag la sgra gcig mthong ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe don mang po dag la sgra gcig mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: When one sees the same sound with many objects,

original: smra ba po'i mngon par 'dod pa'i brjod bya gcig las gzhan pa'i dngos po la mthong bas mthong ba med pa gang yin pa de bzlog pa yin la /
analyzed: smra ba po'i mngon par 'dod pa'i brjod bya gcig las gzhan pa'i dngos po la mthong bas mthong ba med pa gang yin pa de bzlog pa yin la /
translated: The seeing of something other than the single expressed meaning that the speaker intends is absent, and that is what is being refuted.

original: de med pa'i phyir na yang rtogs pa po the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir na yang rtogs pa po the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And because that is absent, the one who understands would be in doubt.

original: 'di snyam du rnam pa de lta bu dngos po dum las mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du rnam pa de lta bu dngos po dum las mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra nyid the tshom gyi rgyu yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that the mere sound that accompanies the seeing of a thing with that kind of aspect is the cause of doubt,

original: gcig la zhes smos te /
analyzed: gcig la zhes smos te /
translated: then the response is ‚Äúin one.‚Äù

original: dngos po gcig la mthong ba'i lta ba po la the tshom med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdon 'di yin te sgra gcig brjod pa las gang gis de don du ma la mthong ba de ni the tshom du 'gyur la /
analyzed: dngos po gcig la mthong ba'i lta ba po la the tshom med pa'i phyir ro // don 'di yin te sgra gcig brjod pa las gang gis de don du ma la mthong ba de ni the tshom du 'gyur la /
translated: Because the one who sees in one thing has no doubt.üîΩThe meaning is this: If one expresses a single sound, then the one who sees it as having many meanings would be in doubt.

original: gang gis sgra de don gcig la mthong ba de ni the tshom du mi 'gyur ba yin te des na don mang po dag la mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra ni the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis sgra de don gcig la mthong ba de ni the tshom du mi 'gyur ba yin te des na don mang po dag la mthong ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra ni the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin no //
translated: But the one who sees that sound as having a single meaning would not be in doubt. Therefore, the sound that accompanies the seeing of many meanings is not the cause of doubt.

original: 'di snyam du the tshom du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa po'i nyes pa yin no snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du the tshom du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa po'i nyes pa yin no snyam du dogs na /
translated: If you think that the fault lies with the cognizer,

original: yang mthong na rtogs par byed pa gcig nyid the tshom du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang mthong na rtogs par byed pa gcig nyid the tshom du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then, when he sees again, he would doubt the very same thing that he had cognized.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: rtogs par byed pa gang gis don du ma la ma mthong ba'i phyir sgra des don nges pa'i rtogs pa po de nyid phyi nas dngos po du ma la mthong ba'i phyir sgra de nyid las the tshom du 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa gang gis don du ma la ma mthong ba'i phyir sgra des don nges pa'i rtogs pa po de nyid phyi nas dngos po du ma la mthong ba'i phyir sgra de nyid las the tshom du 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The very same cognizer who, because he did not see the many meanings of a word, cognized the meaning of a word, later, because he sees the many meanings of that very word, doubts it.

original: de'i phyir rtogs par byed pa'i nyes pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtogs par byed pa'i nyes pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the fault does not lie with the cognizer.

original: sgra'i rang bzhin yang ma yin gyi 'on kyang mthong ba med pa 'am the tshom za ba las yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin yang ma yin gyi 'on kyang mthong ba med pa 'am the tshom za ba las yin no //
translated: It does not lie with the nature of the word either, but rather with the fact that he did not see or doubted.

original: da ni bsgrub pa'i sgo nas mthong ba'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: da ni bsgrub pa'i sgo nas mthong ba'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the activity of seeing from the point of view of the proof, he says:

original: mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba las ma 'das par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba las ma 'das par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he cognizes that he does not go beyond what he sees.

original: 'di ga las she na /üîΩbshad pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra de gang zhig smra ba pos brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par de las khyad par gzhan la mthong zhing rtogs par gyur na rnam pa gzhan @227a * //
analyzed: 'di ga las she na / bshad pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra de gang zhig smra ba pos brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par de las khyad par gzhan la mthong zhing rtogs par gyur na rnam pa gzhan @227a * //
translated: Why is this?üîΩThe sound that expresses the explanation is seen and understood to be different from the particular that the speaker wishes to express.

original: du byed par gzhan la sgra sbyar ba yang log par don gzhan rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du byed par gzhan la sgra sbyar ba yang log par don gzhan rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When the sound is applied to another particular in a different way, it is seen that another meaning is understood.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: rtogs pa pos khyad par gang la mthong ba'i khyad par de nyid sgra de las rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rtogs pa pos khyad par gang la mthong ba'i khyad par de nyid sgra de las rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: The hearer understands the particular that is seen from that sound,

original: smra ba po mngon par 'dod ba'i khyad par ni ma yin te /
analyzed: smra ba po mngon par 'dod ba'i khyad par ni ma yin te /
translated: but not the particular that is intended by the speaker.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa yin no //
translated: For that reason, the understanding is just as the seeing.

original: mthong ba gzhan du gyur na de brda gzhan du gyur na don gzhan yongs su 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba gzhan du gyur na de brda gzhan du gyur na don gzhan yongs su 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: If the seeing changes, and the sign changes, then another meaning is apprehended.

original: de'i phyir na mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir na mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa yin la /
translated: For that reason, the understanding is just as the seeing.

original: de las kyang sgra mthong ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang sgra mthong ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the sound is dependent on the sight.

original: mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i gtan tshigs mthong ba'i dbang gis don gzhan 'dzin pa dang / khyad par gzhan rtogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gi dpe bstan pa'i phyir ka li zhes smos te /

analyzed: rnam 'grel gyi tshig le 'ur byas pa dag gis dngos po'i don dang 'brel pa 'gog par ston par byed do //

translated: The NaiyƒÅyikas say that heaven is a special bliss,

analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i don ni gzhan dag tu rig byed nyid kyis rnam pa gzhan du bshad pa yin no snyam na /

analyzed: bshad pa de 'dra'i rig byed kyi sgra gzhan dag la ni ma grags pa'i don rjod par rtog pa de 'dra'i rnam rtog nyid du 'gyur /

original: de'i don ni 'jig rten pa nyid las brtag par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'jig rten pa nyid las brtag par bya ba yin na /

original: 'jig rten yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten yang tshad ma ma yin te /

original: des na rgyal dpog pa bzhin du kho bo yang der khyi sha za ba dang mthun par rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: des na rgyal dpog pa bzhin du kho bo yang der khyi sha za ba dang mthun par rtogs par byed do //

original: gang gi phyir me la sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i sgra gang zhig nges pa'i don dang ldan par ma grub pa de la nges pa'i don rab tu sgrub par byed pa bstan par bya ba la /

original: skyes bu'i nye bar bstan pa med na rang zhes bya ba me la sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i ngag gi don ston pa'i rang bzhin rig byed kyi phyogs gcig po don ma grub pas nus pa yod pa ma yin te /

original: gang gi phyir de la yang @229a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la yang @229a * //
translated: Because in that case

original: brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir te /

original: ci ltar de la nges par gtan la phebs zhes bya ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshul du'o //
analyzed: ci ltar de la nges par gtan la phebs zhes bya ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshul du'o //
translated: Just as in the case of ‚Äúone should determine that by means of that,‚Äù and so on.

original: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi grags pas rig byed kyi sgra'i don yongs su 'dzin pa ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i grags ba zhes bya bas 'chad do //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi grags pas rig byed kyi sgra'i don yongs su 'dzin pa ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i grags ba zhes bya bas 'chad do //

original: mi rnams kyi brjod pa ni tshad mar mi 'dod pa dang / de las rig byed kyi sgra'i don yang rtogs par byed pa'i sdang ba dad 'dod ba 'di ci lta bu zhig yin /
analyzed: mi rnams kyi brjod pa ni tshad mar mi 'dod pa dang / de las rig byed kyi sgra'i don yang rtogs par byed pa'i sdang ba dad 'dod ba 'di ci lta bu zhig yin /

original: gang kho na'i tshe 'jig rten pa'i dag gang la sdang bar gyur te /üîΩrig byed kyi tshig tshad mar 'dzin pa de nyid kyi tshe de la 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: gang kho na'i tshe 'jig rten pa'i dag gang la sdang bar gyur te / rig byed kyi tshig tshad mar 'dzin pa de nyid kyi tshe de la 'dod pa yin te /

original: de'i dbang gis rig byed kyi don yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis rig byed kyi don yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //

original: ci ste grags pa las rgal ba ste /
analyzed: ci ste grags pa las rgal ba ste /

analyzed: yongs su spangs nas ma grags pa'i don khyi sha za ba rtogs pa la rgyu ci zhig khyed la yod ce na //

original: slob dpon gyis rab grags zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

original: de rnam par 'jog na yang ji ltar tshad ma dang mi ldan pa'i don khyed kyis brtags pa de ltar kho bo yang khyi sha zo shig ces bya bar rtogs pa'i phyir 'o skol gnyis mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //

translated: If you posit it, then just as you imagine the meaning of the Vedas to be nonerroneous, you should also understand that we are the same, since we eat dog meat.

original: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi grags pa gang gis kho bo cag rig byed kyi sgra'i don la the tshom za ba de kho nas khyod don rnam par gnas par byed par ci 'dod 'di ltar grags pa nyid kyis sgra'i don gcig tu nges par bya ba'i skabs su

analyzed: 'dir don ci zhig yin zhes bya ba de 'dra ba'i dogs pa the tshom skyed par byed de /

analyzed: gang zhig gang la the tshom za ba'i rgyu de nyid de la nges pa'i rgyur ni mi rigs so //
translated: It is illogical that the very cause of doubt is the cause of ascertaining the meaning of the words of the Vedas.

analyzed: ci ltar grags pa the tshom gyi rgyu yin zhe na /

original: sgra 'jug par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra 'jug par mthong ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gal te yang 'jig rten gyi sgra ni don sna tshogs pa can yin zhing ;

original: de'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di yin te /

analyzed: brda'i dbang dang grags pa las sgra rnams ni don sna tshogs la 'jug par gnas te /
translated: Words are applied to various meanings by the power of convention and by fame.

original: des na rig byed kyi sgra me la sbyin sreg sbyin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag la nges par byed pa'i rgyu mthong ba med pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi brda'i dbang gis mi 'dod pa'i don yin nam /
analyzed: des na rig byed kyi sgra me la sbyin sreg sbyin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag la nges par byed pa'i rgyu mthong ba med pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi brda'i dbang gis mi 'dod pa'i don yin nam /
translated: Therefore, in the words of the Vedas, ‚ÄúOffer oblations into the fire,‚Äù and so on, the wise who do not see the cause of the ascertainment wonder, ‚ÄúIs the meaning undesirable by the power of convention?

original: 'on te go'i sgra bzhin du rgyal dpog pas mi 'dod pa don gzhan nyid du gsal bar byed pa yin zhes gdon mi za bar the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te go'i sgra bzhin du rgyal dpog pas mi 'dod pa don gzhan nyid du gsal bar byed pa yin zhes gdon mi za bar the tshom du 'gyur ro //

original: de'i phyir dang 'di la grags pa'i dbang nyid kyis the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di na rigs par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dang 'di la grags pa'i dbang nyid kyis the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di na rigs par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that doubt arises in this case because of the power of what is well known.

original: 'di snyam du rig byed nyid rang gi don nges par ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du rig byed nyid rang gi don nges par ston pa yin te /
translated: One might think that the Vedas themselves teach their own meaning.

original: 'di ltar rig byed kyis ni rgyal dpog pa la rang gi don bstan la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rig byed kyis ni rgyal dpog pa la rang gi don bstan la /
translated: In this way, the Vedas teach their own meaning to the brahmins,

original: des na de la rig byed kyi don bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na de la rig byed kyi don bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and they teach the meaning of the Vedas to them.

original: de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To refute that, the root text says:

original: 'ga' zhig sdong du ma 'di na re lam 'di yin no zhes smra'o zhes zer ba dang / gzhan dag bdag nyid lam 'di yin par smra'o zhes zer ba de ltar ro //

translated: Some say, ‚ÄúThis tree is the path,‚Äù and others say, ‚ÄúI am the path.‚Äù

analyzed: 'dis ni don gzhan nye bar bkod pa'i sgo nas don 'di bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the meaning through the presentation of another meaning.

original: gal te rig byed la rang gi don ston pa'i nus pa yod na ni /
analyzed: gal te rig byed la rang gi don ston pa'i nus pa yod na ni /
translated: If the Vedas had the ability to teach their own meaning,

original: bdag cag la nga  rang gi don ston par 'gyur ba nyid yin @230b no ;
analyzed: bdag cag la nga  rang gi don ston par 'gyur ba nyid yin @230b no ;
translated: they would teach their own meaning to us.

original: / des na rgyal dpog pa la yang des rang gi don bstan pa ni med do //
analyzed: / des na rgyal dpog pa la yang des rang gi don bstan pa ni med do //
translated: Therefore, the Jaina also does not teach his own doctrine by means of the Veda.

original: de ni don 'dir rig byed kyis bstan pa yin no zhes smra ba na rig byed la snyad btags nas bdag nyid ston pa yin la /
analyzed: de ni don 'dir rig byed kyis bstan pa yin no zhes smra ba na rig byed la snyad btags nas bdag nyid ston pa yin la /

original: kho bo ni khyi sha za bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa don 'di bdag nyid kyis brtags par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: kho bo ni khyi sha za bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa don 'di bdag nyid kyis brtags par ston pa yin no //
