original: ji ltar yod pa dang byas pa dag gi khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po bsgrubs pa de bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs gzhan dag la yang 'brel pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin du zhes smos so //
analyzed: ji ltar yod pa dang byas pa dag gi khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po bsgrubs pa de bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs gzhan dag la yang 'brel pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin du zhes smos so //
translated: Just as the pervaded and pervader relationship between existence and being produced is established, so the relationship should be established for other natural reasons. To show this, he says ‚Äúsimilarly.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs mtha' med pas gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs mtha' med pas gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
translated: Since natural reasons are infinite, the invalidating valid cognitions are also infinite.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba'i tshad ma dag gis shes pa mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba'i tshad ma dag gis shes pa mang po'i tshig go //
translated: The words ‚Äúby valid cognitions that are just like it‚Äù mean that it is known by many valid cognitions.

original: de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa rjes su 'gro ba grub pa'i bsgrub bya gang yin pa de nyid kyi go bar byed pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa rjes su 'gro ba grub pa'i bsgrub bya gang yin pa de nyid kyi go bar byed pa yod pa yin no //
translated: The property that is to be proven, which is related to and follows from that mere thing, is the evidence that proves it.

original: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na /üîΩdngos po de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni zhes smos te gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na de nyid las te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na / dngos po de tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni zhes smos te gang gi phyir sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na de nyid las te /
translated: Why is that so?üîΩThe text says, ‚ÄúThe nature of a thing that is related to and follows from that mere thing . . .‚Äù Because the nature of a thing that is related to and follows from that mere thing is the evidence that proves it.

original: yul de kho na la med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin no //
analyzed: yul de kho na la med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin no //
translated: It is only in relation to that object that the evidence is ascertained as being a property of the subject and as being the property that is pervaded.

original: rgyu gzhan dang 'brel pa de tsam gyi rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni ma tshang ba dang gegs byed pa srid pas rgyu nye bar res 'ga' ba nye bar gnas pa'i nges pa med pa la 'khrul par yang 'gyur ro
analyzed: rgyu gzhan dang 'brel pa de tsam gyi rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni ma tshang ba dang gegs byed pa srid pas rgyu nye bar res 'ga' ba nye bar gnas pa'i nges pa med pa la 'khrul par yang 'gyur ro
translated: That which is not a nature that is related to other causes in that way is incomplete, and since it is possible that there is an obstruction, it is also mistaken to posit that it is uncertain that the cause sometimes remains near.

original: // de'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la ni gtan tshigs thams cad 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: // de'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la ni gtan tshigs thams cad 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, with respect to a probandum that is like that, all reasons are mistaken.

original: 'o na ji ltar ngo bo nyid gzhan sgrub par byed pa tsam gyi rjes su 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar ngo bo nyid gzhan sgrub par byed pa tsam gyi rjes su 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Well, how is it that it is just the establishment of another nature that is followed?

original: bshad pa / dngos po tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba de lta bus ni gang gi phyir gzhan ni 'ga' yang mi brjod kyi /
analyzed: bshad pa / dngos po tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba de lta bus ni gang gi phyir gzhan ni 'ga' yang mi brjod kyi /
translated: In response to that, it is said: ‚ÄúThat which is called a nature that is related to mere things‚Äù is like that because it is not said that anything else is.

original: 'on kyang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i dngos po de nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i dngos po de nyid do //
translated: However, that very thing that is the proof is the probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa med par thal ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa med par thal ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not the case that it follows that the probandum and the proof are not different.

original: gang gi phyir de dag tha mi dad pa ni dngos su yod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag tha mi dad pa ni dngos su yod pa yin gyi /
translated: Because they are not different, they are actually existent.

original: blos brtags nas ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag tha dad par shes so //
analyzed: blos brtags nas ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag tha dad par shes so //
translated: But having been imputed by the mind, the probandum and the proof are known to be different.

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What follows from that?

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ngo bor nas yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ngo bor nas yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the probandum does not exist as an entity that is its own nature.

original: yod na yang bdag med pa 'am gzhan gyi bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yod na yang bdag med pa 'am gzhan gyi bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Even if it did exist, it would follow that it would be either without a self or with another‚Äôs self.

original: tha dad pa'i @252b bdag nyid ni 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir dang / grub pa dang ma grub pa dag kyang 'dir 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i @252b bdag nyid ni 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir dang / grub pa dang ma grub pa dag kyang 'dir 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because a self that is different is contradictory, and because here the established and the not yet established are contradictory.

original: gal te dngos po gang zhig byas pa 'am yod par mthong ba de ni tshad ma gang gis yod pa dang ldan par mthong ba'i tshad ma de nyid kyis brtag par nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te dngos po gang zhig byas pa 'am yod par mthong ba de ni tshad ma gang gis yod pa dang ldan par mthong ba'i tshad ma de nyid kyis brtag par nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: If a thing that is seen to be produced or existent is not ascertained as being imagined by the valid knowledge by which it is seen to exist,üîΩthen how could it be ascertained by another valid knowledge?

original: des na tshad mas yul du byas pa'i yod pa gang yin pa de ni rtag pa'i khyad par can nyid du nges so //
analyzed: des na tshad mas yul du byas pa'i yod pa gang yin pa de ni rtag pa'i khyad par can nyid du nges so //
translated: Therefore, whatever exists as an object of valid cognition is ascertained as having the attribute of permanence.

original: des na gal te yod pa nyid rtags su nye bar len na ni de mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du nges pa yin la 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du nges par bya ba'i yod pa yang 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gzhan nye bar sdud nus paüîΩma yin no //
analyzed: des na gal te yod pa nyid rtags su nye bar len na ni de mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du nges pa yin la 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du nges par bya ba'i yod pa yang 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gzhan nye bar sdud nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, if existence is taken as the reason, it is ascertained as having a nature that is contradictory with impermanence. And the existence that is ascertained as having a contradictory nature cannot include another contradictory nature.

original: ci ste yang rtag pa dang bral ba'i yod pa nyid 'ba' zhig rtags su 'god par 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: ci ste yang rtag pa dang bral ba'i yod pa nyid 'ba' zhig rtags su 'god par 'dod pa yin na /
translated: If one asserts that the mere existence that is devoid of permanence is the reason,

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: that also is illogical.

original: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig tshad mas grub pa de nyid rtags nyid nye bar dgod par rigs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig tshad mas grub pa de nyid rtags nyid nye bar dgod par rigs te /
translated: Because it is logical to posit only that which is established by valid cognition as the reason,

original: ma grub pa ni rtags su mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni rtags su mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not tenable that an unestablished reason is a reason.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'ba' zhig pa ni grub pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'ba' zhig pa ni grub pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But such a mere existence is not established.

original: 'di ni tshad ma'i bya ba mi shes pa'i 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma'i bya ba mi shes pa'i 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: This is the transformation of not knowing the activity of valid knowledge.

original: 'di ltar ma nges pa'i don 'jug pa'i yul du bya bar nus pa ma yin la 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa yang tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar ma nges pa'i don 'jug pa'i yul du bya bar nus pa ma yin la 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa yang tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Thus, an object that is not ascertained cannot be made into an object of engagement, and that which does not engage is not valid knowledge.

original: de'i phyir nges pa'i yul la 'jug par byed pa tshad ma yin pa na nges pa skyed par nus pa la ltos pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa'i yul la 'jug par byed pa tshad ma yin pa na nges pa skyed par nus pa la ltos pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when valid knowledge engages an ascertained object, it must depend on the ability to generate ascertainment.

original: nges pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid phan tshun ldog pa'i khyad par ltos nas brtag pa'i chos kyi yul can yin la /
analyzed: nges pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid phan tshun ldog pa'i khyad par ltos nas brtag pa'i chos kyi yul can yin la /
translated: Ascertainment is a mental state that has as its object a phenomenon that is imagined in dependence on the specific difference of its intrinsic identity.

original: brtags pa'i chos kyang ldog mtshams kyi khyad par la ltos nas phan tshun tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtags pa'i chos kyang ldog mtshams kyi khyad par la ltos nas phan tshun tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the imagined phenomenon is also different from each other in dependence on the specific difference of its boundary.

original: nges pa'i cha gang la mi slu bar rjes su rdzogs pa de nyid la ni tshad ma yin la ;
analyzed: nges pa'i cha gang la mi slu bar rjes su rdzogs pa de nyid la ni tshad ma yin la ;
translated: That which is undeceiving with regard to the aspect of ascertainment is valid knowledge.

original: gang slu ba de la ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gang slu ba de la ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: That which is deceiving is not valid knowledge.

original: dper na skra shad kyi tshogs su 'dzin pa'i rab rib can gyi shes pa skra shad kyi cha la ni tshad ma ma yin la /
analyzed: dper na skra shad kyi tshogs su 'dzin pa'i rab rib can gyi shes pa skra shad kyi cha la ni tshad ma ma yin la /
translated: For example, the consciousness of one who is afflicted by eye disease and apprehends a mass of hairs is not a valid cognition with regard to the parts of the hairs.

original: rang gi ngo bo'i cha la ni tshad ma ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo'i cha la ni tshad ma ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: But it is a valid cognition with regard to the part that is its own nature.

original: de'i phyir nges pa la mi slu ba la ltos nas tshad ma yin pa dang / nges pa'i yul gyi chos rnams kyang ldog mtshams la ltos nas tha dad pa yin pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa la mi slu ba la ltos nas tshad ma yin pa dang / nges pa'i yul gyi chos rnams kyang ldog mtshams la ltos nas tha dad pa yin pa la /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on nondeception with regard to the ascertained object, there is valid knowledge, and the phenomena that are the objects of the ascertainment are different in dependence on the division of their boundaries.

original: tshad ma'i bya ba ni chos so so tha dad ba la yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma'i bya ba ni chos so so tha dad ba la yin no //
translated: The activity of valid knowledge is with regard to the individual, separate phenomena.

original: des na med pa las ldog pas brtags pa'i yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rtag pa nyid dang lhan cig tshad ma'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: des na med pa las ldog pas brtags pa'i yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rtag pa nyid dang lhan cig tshad ma'i yul ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the existence that is imputed in dependence on the reversal of nonexistence is not the object of valid knowledge together with permanence.

original: yod pa nyid de ni rtag pa las tha dad par mngon sum gyi tshad mas grub pa @253a * //
analyzed: yod pa nyid de ni rtag pa las tha dad par mngon sum gyi tshad mas grub pa @253a * //
translated: That existence is established by the valid knowledge of direct perception as different from permanence.

original: yin la / rtag pa nyid kyang yod pa las tha dad par bya ba gzhan gyi yul yin no //
analyzed: yin la / rtag pa nyid kyang yod pa las tha dad par bya ba gzhan gyi yul yin no //
translated: And permanence is the object of a different activity that is different from existence.

original: des na mi slu ba dang ldan pa'i yod pa tsam nyid la brten nas mngon sum gyis nges pa'i rtag pa gang yin pa de la mi slu bar the tshom za ba na rnam par dpyad pa yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa'am /
analyzed: des na mi slu ba dang ldan pa'i yod pa tsam nyid la brten nas mngon sum gyis nges pa'i rtag pa gang yin pa de la mi slu bar the tshom za ba na rnam par dpyad pa yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa'am /
translated: Therefore, if one doubts whether permanence ascertained by direct perception is undeceiving in dependence on mere existence that possesses nondeception, then it is not established because it is analyzed.üîΩ

original: 'gal ba nyid kyi skyon med do //
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid kyi skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, when one doubts whether permanence, which is ascertained by direct perception in dependence on mere existence that is endowed with nondeceptiveness, is nondeceptive, then since it is analyzed, there is no fault of nonestablishment or contradiction.

original: ji ste gang du khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po grub par 'gyur ba ni rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la dpe ci yod gzhung la brten nas ni gtan tshigs dgod par bya ba ma yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ste gang du khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po grub par 'gyur ba ni rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la dpe ci yod gzhung la brten nas ni gtan tshigs dgod par bya ba ma yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúWhat is the example for proving permanence, where the relationship of the pervaded and the pervader is established?‚Äù it is explained that a reason is not to be stated in dependence on a treatise.

original: gzhan gzhung lugs la mi brten pa dag gang gi tshe skad cig ma nyid la phyir zlog par byed pa de'i tshe 'dis sun 'byin pas kyang don 'ga' zhig skad cig ma nyid du khas len du gzhug dgos te /
analyzed: gzhan gzhung lugs la mi brten pa dag gang gi tshe skad cig ma nyid la phyir zlog par byed pa de'i tshe 'dis sun 'byin pas kyang don 'ga' zhig skad cig ma nyid du khas len du gzhug dgos te /
translated: When others who do not rely on a scriptural tradition refute momentariness, at that time, since they refute momentariness, they must accept that some object is momentary.

original: de lta ma yin na dpe med pas gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dpe med pas gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, because there would be no example, it would not be a reason.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma grub pa la ni dpe 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma grub pa la ni dpe 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, when the property to be established is not established, there is no example at all.

original: de dang der dpe gzung bar bshad pa gang yin pa der ni dgongs pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de dang der dpe gzung bar bshad pa gang yin pa der ni dgongs pa 'di yin te /
translated: The explanation of the use of examples in those and other contexts is as follows.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las gzhan pa'i dngos po la gtan tshigs yod pa la brten nas gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pa nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las gzhan pa'i dngos po la gtan tshigs yod pa la brten nas gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pa nus pa yin gyi /
translated: The purpose of an example is to show that a valid cognition that contradicts the presence of the reason in the subject of the thesis is possible.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the example is used in any other way.

original: des na gtan tshigs yod pa'i yul gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma rab tu ston pa'i spyod yul gyi don ni dpe yin gyi /üîΩphyir rgol ba la bsgrub bya'i chos dang ldan par grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs yod pa'i yul gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma rab tu ston pa'i spyod yul gyi don ni dpe yin gyi / phyir rgol ba la bsgrub bya'i chos dang ldan par grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the purpose of an example is to show that a valid cognition that contradicts the presence of the reason in the subject of the thesis is possible.üîΩIt is not the case that the example is used to establish that the subject of the thesis possesses the property to be proven.

original: gal te gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma bsgrub bya'i chos grub pa la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma bsgrub bya'i chos grub pa la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: If a valid cognition that contradicts the presence of the reason in the subject of the thesis does not depend on the establishment of the property to be proven,

original: de lta na ni 'o na gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gang gis dpe'i chos can la byas pa mi rtag pas khyab pa ston pa'i tshad ma de nyid kyis bsgrub bya'i chos can la yang mi rtag pa nyid grub pas thams cad du gnod par byed pa'i
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gang gis dpe'i chos can la byas pa mi rtag pas khyab pa ston pa'i tshad ma de nyid kyis bsgrub bya'i chos can la yang mi rtag pa nyid grub pas thams cad du gnod par byed pa'i
translated: If that were so, then whatever valid cognition contradicts the pervasion of product by impermanence in the example subject would also establish impermanence in the predicate subject.

original: tshad ma nyid bsgrub bya sgrub par nus pa yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma nyid bsgrub bya sgrub par nus pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, in all cases, the valid cognition that contradicts the reason would be able to establish the predicate.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid ma yin par thal lo //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid ma yin par thal lo //
translated: Therefore it follows that it would not be an autonomous reason.

original: ji ste yang yod pa 'am byas pa la ma brten par gnod par byed pa nyid mi 'jug pas yod pa la brten par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: ji ste yang yod pa 'am byas pa la ma brten par gnod par byed pa nyid mi 'jug pas yod pa la brten par bya ba yin na /
translated: But if you say that without relying on existence or being a product, contradiction is not engaged, so it must rely on existence,

original: de lta na yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dang lhan cig pa'i phyogs kyi chos nyid las bsgrub bya grub pa'i phyir tshul gsum med par thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma dang lhan cig pa'i phyogs kyi chos nyid las bsgrub bya grub pa'i phyir tshul gsum med par thal lo zhe na /
translated: then, in that case, because the predicate is established from the property of the subject that is concomitant with the valid cognition that contradicts it, it follows that the three modes are not established.

original: smras pa / bsgrub par bya'i chos can nyid la khyab pa grub pa des na chos can gzhan yongs su gzung pas @253b ci bya zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: smras pa / bsgrub par bya'i chos can nyid la khyab pa grub pa des na chos can gzhan yongs su gzung pas @253b ci bya zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
translated: Objection: You say, ‚ÄúSince the pervasion is established in relation to the subject that is to be affirmed, what is the point of positing another subject?‚Äù That is illogical.

original: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las ma gtogs pa'i mthong ba'i dngos po yongs su spangs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las ma gtogs pa'i mthong ba'i dngos po yongs su spangs te /
translated: Why? Because apart from the subject that is to be affirmed, the object of seeing is completely rejected.

original: chos can gcig nyid la ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: chos can gcig nyid la ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma bstan par mi nus so //
translated: It is impossible to demonstrate a valid cognition that contradicts a single subject.

original: gal te sgra skad cig ma ma yin na yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes de ltar gnod pa byed pa'i tshad ma bstan par bya ba yin na gal te gzhan dag ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i dngos po skad cig nyid ma yin
analyzed: gal te sgra skad cig ma ma yin na yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes de ltar gnod pa byed pa'i tshad ma bstan par bya ba yin na gal te gzhan dag ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i dngos po skad cig nyid ma yin
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIf sound is not momentary, it would not exist,‚Äù and you demonstrate a valid cognition that contradicts that, then if others say, ‚ÄúJust as the object of seeing, such as a pot, is not momentary,

original: yang don byed pa yin pa de bzhin du sgra 'di yang yin no zhes de skad smra ba na /
analyzed: yang don byed pa yin pa de bzhin du sgra 'di yang yin no zhes de skad smra ba na /
translated: but it still performs a function, so too sound is like that,‚ÄùüîΩwhat would you say to that?

original: mthong ba'i bum pa la sogs pa de dag kyang gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas yul du bya dgos shing /
analyzed: mthong ba'i bum pa la sogs pa de dag kyang gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas yul du bya dgos shing /
translated: Also, those seen pots and so on must be taken as objects by valid knowledge that contradicts them.

original: de dag yul du byas pa na yang dngos po mi snang ba 'ga' zhig don byed kyang /
analyzed: de dag yul du byas pa na yang dngos po mi snang ba 'ga' zhig don byed kyang /
translated: And when they are taken as objects, some things that do not appear are still functional.

original: skad cig ma ma yin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du mthong ba 'di dag kyang yin no zhes kyang smra ba na /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du mthong ba 'di dag kyang yin no zhes kyang smra ba na /
translated: So too, these seen things are also like that.

original: gzhan gyi dper byas pa mi snang ba'i dngos po yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas yul du bya dgos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dper byas pa mi snang ba'i dngos po yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas yul du bya dgos pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the things that are not seen that are taken as examples by others must be taken as objects by valid knowledge that contradicts them.

original: ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gcig nyid la gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma rab tu bstan par bya ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gcig nyid la gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma rab tu bstan par bya ba yin /
translated: So how could one and the same subject of a proposition be taught to be taken as an object by valid knowledge that contradicts it?

original: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po sgrub par byed pa ni don thams cad nye bar bsdus pa'i yul can du bzhed pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po sgrub par byed pa ni don thams cad nye bar bsdus pa'i yul can du bzhed pa yin te /
translated: For that very reason, the master Dharmottara asserts that the proof of the relationship between the predicate and the subject is a subject that subsumes all objects.

original: gang cung zad byas pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gang cung zad byas pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: Whatever is produced is impermanent.

original: phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam pa rang bye ba la ltos pa ni khyab par mi 'dod de /üîΩde'i phyir don thams cad kyi yul can gyi rtags nyid gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas rang gi bsgrub par bya bas khyab par bya bas khyab pa grub pa nges par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam pa rang bye ba la ltos pa ni khyab par mi 'dod de / de'i phyir don thams cad kyi yul can gyi rtags nyid gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas rang gi bsgrub par bya bas khyab par bya bas khyab pa grub pa nges par bya'o //
translated: We do not accept that the aspect of direction and so on is pervaded by the particular, becauseüîΩit is not possible to prove that the reason is pervaded by the probandum.

original: gal te don thams cad nye bar bsdus pa dang ldan pa'i khyab par nye bar ston pa na thams cad kyi nang du 'dus pas sgra yang skad cig mar grub pa'i phyir phyogs kyi chos nye bar bsdu ba don med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te don thams cad nye bar bsdus pa dang ldan pa'i khyab par nye bar ston pa na thams cad kyi nang du 'dus pas sgra yang skad cig mar grub pa'i phyir phyogs kyi chos nye bar bsdu ba don med do zhe na /
translated: If the pervasion is stated to include all objects, then since sound is included among all objects, it is established as momentary. Therefore it is pointless to include the property of the subject.

original: de ci da ni skyes bus gang yod pa de thams cad mi rtag go zhes nges pas ri bong gi rva yang yod do zhes shes sam ;
analyzed: de ci da ni skyes bus gang yod pa de thams cad mi rtag go zhes nges pas ri bong gi rva yang yod do zhes shes sam ;
translated: If it is known that whatever exists is impermanent, then is it also known that a rabbit‚Äôs horns exist?

original: gal te ri bong gi rva ni med pa'i phyir mi shes kyi sgra ni yod pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ri bong gi rva ni med pa'i phyir mi shes kyi sgra ni yod pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that sound is known because the horn of a rabbit does not exist,

original: 'o na ni de tshad ma gzhan gyis shes par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni de tshad ma gzhan gyis shes par bya ba yin te /
translated: then it is to be known by another means of valid knowledge.

original: gang zhig shes na ri bong gi rva ltar sgra ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //üîΩde'i phyir khyab pa'i dus su spyis sgra nang du 'dus kyang skad cig ma @254a * //
analyzed: gang zhig shes na ri bong gi rva ltar sgra ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no // de'i phyir khyab pa'i dus su spyis sgra nang du 'dus kyang skad cig ma @254a * //
translated: For when one knows that sound is not like the horn of a rabbit, one understands that it exists.

original: nyid du nges par bya ba'i phyir yod pa nyid khyad par du tshad ma gzhan gyis shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nyid du nges par bya ba'i phyir yod pa nyid khyad par du tshad ma gzhan gyis shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though sound is included in the universal at the time of the pervasion, its existence is to be known by another means of valid knowledge in order to ascertain its momentariness.

original: gang zhig sgrub par byed pa'i tshig gi sngon rol du yod pa nyid shes pa de la ni de nyid phyogs kyi chos yongs su shes pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig sgrub par byed pa'i tshig gi sngon rol du yod pa nyid shes pa de la ni de nyid phyogs kyi chos yongs su shes pa yin te /
translated: For one who knows existence prior to the statement proving it, that itself is the complete knowledge of the property of the subject.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa dang phyogs kyi chos dag la go rims nges pa 'ga' yang med do zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa dang phyogs kyi chos dag la go rims nges pa 'ga' yang med do zhes bshad do //
translated: For this very reason, it is explained that there is no fixed order between the relation and the property of the subject.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs bstan pa'i phyir don gzhan rtogs par bya ba la ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs bstan pa'i phyir don gzhan rtogs par bya ba la ni zhes smos so //
translated: In order to demonstrate the reasoning of effect, he says, ‚ÄúIn order to understand a different object.‚Äù

original: rtags ni sgron ma la sogs pa bzhin du rung ba tsam gyis don go bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rtags ni sgron ma la sogs pa bzhin du rung ba tsam gyis don go bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: A reason is not something that causes understanding of an object merely by being suitable, like a lamp, for example.

original: 'on kyang mi 'khrul pa nyid du shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang mi 'khrul pa nyid du shes pa yin no //
translated: Rather, it is known to be non-erroneous.

original: 'khrul pa med pa yang 'bras bu nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa yang 'bras bu nyid yin te /
translated: And non-erroneous is itself an effect.

original: des na 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is non-erroneous, it causes understanding.

original: gal te ldan pa can dang 'du ba can la sogs pa yang 'khrul pa med pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ldan pa can dang 'du ba can la sogs pa yang 'khrul pa med pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But aren‚Äôt possession, inherence, and so on also non-erroneous?

original: bshad pa / 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba de de las skyes pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khrul pa ma yin la /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba de de las skyes pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khrul pa ma yin la /
translated: We respond: In that case, that which is not produced from that is not non-erroneous.

original: ldan pa can la sogs pa yang de las skyes na ni de nyid kyis de las mi 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa can la sogs pa yang de las skyes na ni de nyid kyis de las mi 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: But if possession and so on are produced from that, then they are non-erroneous because of that.

original: ma skyes na ni mi 'khrul pa nyid ma yin no zhes 'chad pa ni rag ma las pa ma 'brel pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa rnams te de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba med pa la ni 'brel pa 'ga' yang med pas na rag ma lasüîΩpa nyid ni lhan cig 'byung bar nges pa med do //
analyzed: ma skyes na ni mi 'khrul pa nyid ma yin no zhes 'chad pa ni rag ma las pa ma 'brel pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa rnams te de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba med pa la ni 'brel pa 'ga' yang med pas na rag ma las pa nyid ni lhan cig 'byung bar nges pa med do //
translated: If it does not arise, then it is not non-erroneous.üîΩThat which is not dependent is not related, and that which is not related does not have the nature of that nor does it arise from that. Therefore, since it is not related in any way, it is not necessarily co-existent.

original: gang zhig gang la rag mi las pa de ni 'brel pa'i yul ma yin pa de dang lhan cig nges par yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la rag mi las pa de ni 'brel pa'i yul ma yin pa de dang lhan cig nges par yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not dependent on something is not related to that, and it is not necessarily present with that.

original: dper na ba la sogs pa dang rta bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ba la sogs pa dang rta bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like a cow and a horse.

original: de de'i chos su ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar gtan tshigs ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang chos can las tha dad pa yin na de dag gi 'bras bu yin la /
analyzed: de de'i chos su ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar gtan tshigs ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang chos can las tha dad pa yin na de dag gi 'bras bu yin la /
translated: How could it be its property? The idea is this: If the reason is different from the property of the probandum and the subject, then it is the effect of those.

original: dus mtshungs pa nyid kyi rgyu can gyi chos dang chos can gyi dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ni bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: dus mtshungs pa nyid kyi rgyu can gyi chos dang chos can gyi dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ni bsam pa yin no //
translated: But it is not tenable that the state of being a property of the subject and a property that are simultaneous have a cause and effect relationship.

original: cig shos ni dus mnyam pa nyid ni cir yang mi dgos kyi /
analyzed: cig shos ni dus mnyam pa nyid ni cir yang mi dgos kyi /
translated: The simultaneity of the two is not necessary at all.

original: chos dang chos can gyi dngos po ni rten dang brten pa las yin no snyam nas smras pa ;
analyzed: chos dang chos can gyi dngos po ni rten dang brten pa las yin no snyam nas smras pa ;
translated: The relationship of property and possessor is based on the support and the supported.üîΩThe other says:

original: de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the support.

original: cig shos kyis ni chos dang chos can gyi rgyu mtshan de'i rten nyid dus gcig par bsams nas smras pa /
analyzed: cig shos kyis ni chos dang chos can gyi rgyu mtshan de'i rten nyid dus gcig par bsams nas smras pa /
translated: The other, thinking that the property and the possessor are the support of the reason, says:

original: ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin te /
translated: How can they be the relationship of cause and effect?

original: de dag ni dus tha dad par grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ni dus tha dad par grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because they are established as different times.

original: slob dpon ni 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug bzhin du tha dad pa'i rten gyi rgyu @254b mtshan ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin par dgongs nas bshad pa /
analyzed: slob dpon ni 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug bzhin du tha dad pa'i rten gyi rgyu @254b mtshan ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin par dgongs nas bshad pa /
translated: The master thinks that the reason for the difference between the property and the possessor is the relationship of cause and effect, like a bowl and yogurt, and explains:

original: de nyid kyi phyir te /üîΩrten nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te / rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of that itself.üîΩBecause of being the support.

original: gang gi phyir rten yin pa de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rten yin pa de nyid kyis na /
translated: Because of being the support,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the relationship of cause and effect is established.

original: de ltar ma yin te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin na ni rten nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir te ;
analyzed: de ltar ma yin te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin na ni rten nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir te ;
translated: It is not so, because if there is no real entity of cause and effect, the support itself is not established.

original: thams cad la ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad la ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For, it would follow that everything is a support.

original: cig shos ni yul tha dad pas na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang / rten dang brten pa'i dngos po tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir gal te du ba'i rten ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: cig shos ni yul tha dad pas na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang / rten dang brten pa'i dngos po tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir gal te du ba'i rten ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The other is stated in order to teach that the real entity of cause and effect and the real entity of support and supported are different, and so he says, ‚ÄúIf the support of smoke is fire.‚Äù

original: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyu mtshan can nyid rten yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyu mtshan can nyid rten yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how can the support be the very cause of the effect?

original: de yang zhes smos te /
analyzed: de yang zhes smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThat also.‚Äù

original: gang yang rten du mngon par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs kyang du ba'i gzhi yin pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rgyu nyid do //
analyzed: gang yang rten du mngon par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs kyang du ba'i gzhi yin pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rgyu nyid do //
translated: The place that is accepted as the support is also the cause because it is the basis and the location of smoke.üîΩThus, smoke is also the cause because it is located in proximity to fire, having abandoned another place.

original: 'di ltar du ba yang yul gzhan spangs nas me dang nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i ming can gyi yul la brten nas 'jug pa na /
analyzed: 'di ltar du ba yang yul gzhan spangs nas me dang nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i ming can gyi yul la brten nas 'jug pa na /
translated: When it is said that it is located in proximity to fire, having abandoned another place, it is said that it is located in proximity to fire, having abandoned another place, because it is located in proximity to fire, having abandoned another place.

original: snang ba'i ming can gyi yul gyi 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i ming can gyi yul gyi 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The object that is the cause of the effect that is called ‚Äúappearance‚Äù is the object that is the support of the fuel.

original: gang gi tshe bud shing gi rten gyi yul gzung ba de'i tshe ni gzhir gyur pa'i yul de bud shing la sogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir brgyud nas du ba'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bud shing gi rten gyi yul gzung ba de'i tshe ni gzhir gyur pa'i yul de bud shing la sogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir brgyud nas du ba'i rgyu yin te /
translated: When the object that is the support of the fuel is apprehended, then the object that is the support is the cause of the fuel, etc., and indirectly the cause of the smoke.

original: rnam pa thams cad du rgyu ma yin pa ni rten ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du rgyu ma yin pa ni rten ma yin no //
translated: That which is not a cause in every way is not a support.

original: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po thams cad la yod pa de lta na yang rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par nyid yin te /
analyzed: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po thams cad la yod pa de lta na yang rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par nyid yin te /
translated: Even if the state of cause and effect exists in all things, the state of support and supported is a particular kind of cause and effect.

original: des na thams cad la thal ches pa ni med de dper na rgyu nyid las 'ga' zhig gsal bar byed pa yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: des na thams cad la thal ches pa ni med de dper na rgyu nyid las 'ga' zhig gsal bar byed pa yin pa bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no overextension, just as a cause is sometimes the illuminator.

original: de las byung ba ni de las skye ba se /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni de las skye ba se /
translated: That which arises from it is born from it.

original: gal te gtan tshigs de'i phyir 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs de'i phyir 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin na /
translated: If the effect is understood because of that reason,

original: de'i tshe skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir me ni go bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir me ni go bar bya ba yin la /
translated: then fire is the object to be understood because it is the producer.

original: bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir du ba ni go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir du ba ni go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Smoke is the signifier because it is the effect.

original: bskyed par bya ba yang de dang de las ldog par byed pa yin pa zhing /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba yang de dang de las ldog par byed pa yin pa zhing /
translated: And the effect is the signifier because it is the negation of that and that.

original: skyed par byed ba yang me cha shas med pa yin te /
analyzed: skyed par byed ba yang me cha shas med pa yin te /
translated: And the signifier is the partless fire because it is the cause of the effect.

original: des na ji ltar ldog pa thams cad kyi me skyed par byed pa yin pa dang / du ba bskyed par bya ba yin pa de bzhin du ldog pa thams cad kyis go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na ji ltar ldog pa thams cad kyi me skyed par byed pa yin pa dang / du ba bskyed par bya ba yin pa de bzhin du ldog pa thams cad kyis go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, just as all negations are the signifier and the effect is the signified, in the same way, all negations would be the signifier and the signified in the relation of signifier and signified,üîΩbecause that is the reason for the relation of signifier and signified.

original: de ni bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos so //üîΩgang zhig gang med par yang 'byung ba'i dngos po de ni de @255a * //
analyzed: de ni bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos so // gang zhig gang med par yang 'byung ba'i dngos po de ni de @255a * //
translated: To dispel this doubt, he says, ‚ÄúIt is not so.‚Äù

original: med par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: med par 'byung ba ste /
translated: That thing which occurs even when something else is absent is the occurrence of that thing in the absence of that.

original: des na dngos po de las skye bar nges pa gang yin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na dngos po de las skye bar nges pa gang yin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because there is no certainty that that thing arises from that,

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te skye bar nges pa med pa'i phyir na gang las rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid med pa der /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te skye bar nges pa med pa'i phyir na gang las rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid med pa der /
translated: This is what is being said: because there is no certainty of arising, how could there be the relationship of cause and effect?

original: ji ltar go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur /
translated: How could there be the relationship of the object to be understood and the means of understanding?

original: der ni ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi chos 'ga' zhig kho na rgyu dang 'bras bu dang 'brel pa bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i dngos po'i yul du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: der ni ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi chos 'ga' zhig kho na rgyu dang 'bras bu dang 'brel pa bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa'i dngos po'i yul du gyur pa yin te /
translated: In that case, some phenomena that have the reason of reversal are the object of the relationship of cause and effect, that which is to be produced and that which produces.

original: des na chos 'ga' zhig kho na bskyed par bya ba dang skyed pa'i dngos po yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na chos 'ga' zhig kho na bskyed par bya ba dang skyed pa'i dngos po yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, some phenomena are the object of that which is to be produced and that which produces, but not all.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it is said:

original: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig kho na la rgyu dang 'bras bu dngos po yod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig kho na la rgyu dang 'bras bu dngos po yod pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because some have the relationship of cause and effect,

original: phan tshun ldog pa la ltos nas rnam par gzhag pa rgyu la rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: phan tshun ldog pa la ltos nas rnam par gzhag pa rgyu la rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin /
translated: the nature that abides in the cause is established in dependence on the mutual reversal.

original: ji snyed cig / med na mi 'byung ba 'brel pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu la gnas pa de dag nyid kyi go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ji snyed cig / med na mi 'byung ba 'brel pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu la gnas pa de dag nyid kyi go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The effect of natural outflow is the effect of the cause that is concomitant with it.

original: tsan dan gyi me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag dang med na mi 'byung ba'i nges pa med pa de dag gi go bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tsan dan gyi me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag dang med na mi 'byung ba'i nges pa med pa de dag gi go bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The effect of natural outflow is not the effect of those that are not concomitant with the cause, such as the nature of sandalwood fire and so on.

original: yang ji ltar na la de na mi 'byung ba'i yul gyi chos rnams kho na'i go bar byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na la de na mi 'byung ba'i yul gyi chos rnams kho na'i go bar byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the effect of natural outflow is the effect of only those phenomena that are concomitant with it?

original: bshad pa / de ni de dag gi 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / de ni de dag gi 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yin te /
translated: It is ascertained that it is the effect of only those phenomena that are concomitant with it.

original: des na de ni chos de dag kho na'i 'bras /
analyzed: des na de ni chos de dag kho na'i 'bras /
translated: Therefore, it is the effect of only those phenomena that are concomitant with it.

original: nges kyi gzhan dag gi ni ma yin no //üîΩde'i phyir de dag kho na'i go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: nges kyi gzhan dag gi ni ma yin no // de'i phyir de dag kho na'i go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: It is not the effect of other phenomena.üîΩTherefore, it is the effect of only those phenomena that are concomitant with it.

original: da ni 'bras bu rtags pa'i chos rnams las kyang gang dag go bar byed pa yin pa'i chos de dag bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'bras bu rtags pa'i chos rnams las kyang gang dag go bar byed pa yin pa'i chos de dag bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate those phenomena that are the effect of the cause that is natural outflow, he says:

original: gang dag de dag de med na mi 'byung ba de dag kho nas yin no zhes smos so //
analyzed: gang dag de dag de med na mi 'byung ba de dag kho nas yin no zhes smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThey are only those that do not occur when those are absent.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu la yod pa'i khyad par gyi chos gang dag rgyu la yod pa'i spyi'i yod pa'i spyi'i chos de dag med na mi 'byung ba de kho na go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu la yod pa'i khyad par gyi chos gang dag rgyu la yod pa'i spyi'i yod pa'i spyi'i chos de dag med na mi 'byung ba de kho na go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Those specific properties that exist in the effect are the only ones that are understood to be the general properties that exist in the cause and that do not occur when those are absent.

original: spyi'i chos dngos po dang lus can nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi'i chos dngos po dang lus can nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But general properties such as being a thing and being a body do not exist in the cause,

original: de dag ni me med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni me med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they occur even when fire is absent.

original: sngar gyi de dag gi 'bras bu nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang 'dir gtan tshigs su blta'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi de dag gi 'bras bu nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang 'dir gtan tshigs su blta'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause they are ascertained to be the effect of those‚Äù should be seen as the reason here.

original: gal te chos 'ga' zhig kho na dang med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin na ni de'i tshe chos de dag kho na dang bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par bya ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la ma yin te zhes smos so //
analyzed: gal te chos 'ga' zhig kho na dang med na mi 'byung ba nges pa yin na ni de'i tshe chos de dag kho na dang bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par bya ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la ma yin te zhes smos so //
translated: If it were certain that some property does not occur when some other property is absent, then at that time those properties would be the entity that is produced and the producer.

original: des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par de gzung @255b na ni skyed par byed pa dang 'brel pa'i chos go bar bya ba nyid yin par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par de gzung @255b na ni skyed par byed pa dang 'brel pa'i chos go bar bya ba nyid yin par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one were to apprehend the particular that is to be produced by that, then the particular that exists in the cause would be understood, because it is asserted that the particular that is to be produced is related to the producer.

original: gang gi tshe 'bras bur gtogs pa'i des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par nges pa de'i tshe ni rgyu la yod pa'i khyad par gyi chos go bar bya bar 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'bras bur gtogs pa'i des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par nges pa de'i tshe ni rgyu la yod pa'i khyad par gyi chos go bar bya bar 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: When the particular that is to be produced by that is ascertained as belonging to the effect, then the particular that exists in the cause would be understood.

original: des na gang gis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yang nges pa'i yul can du 'gyur ba /
analyzed: des na gang gis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yang nges pa'i yul can du 'gyur ba /
translated: Therefore, the state of being a producer and the state of being a product would be ascertained objects.

original: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni nges pa'i yul can nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po ni nges pa'i yul can nyid ma yin no //
translated: But the state of being an object of understanding and the state of being an object of understanding are not ascertained objects.

original: des na 'di la don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di la don ni 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, the point here is this:

original: dngos po la bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po yod do zhes de tsam gyis ni go bya go byed kyi dngos po ma yin no /
analyzed: dngos po la bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po yod do zhes de tsam gyis ni go bya go byed kyi dngos po ma yin no /
translated: The mere fact that the state of being a product and the state of being a producer exist in things is not the state of being an object of understanding and the state of being an object of understanding.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po nges pa ni go bya go byed kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po nges pa ni go bya go byed kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: The reason for the understanding of the understood and the understanding of the understander is the certainty of the thing to be produced and the producer.

original: ldog pa 'ga' zhig tu nges na ni dngos po de la 'khrul par shes pa yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa 'ga' zhig tu nges na ni dngos po de la 'khrul par shes pa yin te /
translated: If there were certainty of some exclusion, then that thing would be understood as mistaken.

original: dper na tsan dan gyi mer nges pa ni du ba tsam gyi skyed byed du nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na tsan dan gyi mer nges pa ni du ba tsam gyi skyed byed du nges pa ma yin te /
translated: For example, if it were certain that sandalwood is fire, it would not be certain that it is the producer of mere smoke.

original: de med kyang du ba tsam mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang du ba tsam mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even when it is absent, mere smoke is seen.

original: du ba yang dngos po nyid la sogs pa dang ldan par nges na me'i 'bras bu nyid du nges par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: du ba yang dngos po nyid la sogs pa dang ldan par nges na me'i 'bras bu nyid du nges par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: If it were certain that smoke has the nature of a thing, etc., it would not become certain that it is the effect of fire.

original: me med kyang dngos po tsam yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdes na dngos po la bdag nyid thams cad kyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin yang /
analyzed: me med kyang dngos po tsam yod pa'i phyir ro // des na dngos po la bdag nyid thams cad kyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin yang /
translated: Because even when fire is absent, mere things exist.üîΩTherefore, although a thing is the thing to be produced and the producer by its entire nature,

analyzed: go bya go byed kyi ngo bo ni cha thams cad la bskyed bya skyed byed du nges par 'gyur ba yin no //

original: de med pa ni ma nges pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin la /
analyzed: de med pa ni ma nges pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin la /

analyzed: nges pa la ltos pas ni bskyed bya skyed byed dag cha shas can du thal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: And because of the dependence on ascertainment, it is not the case that the produced and the producer are reduced to parts.

original: rgyu la yod pa'i khyad par rnams go bar bya ba nyid du bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: rgyu la yod pa'i khyad par rnams go bar bya ba nyid du bsgrubs nas /

analyzed: 'bras bu la yod pa'i spyi yang go bar byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /

original: rtags nyid bye brag ste khyad par de dag la yod pa'i spyi gang yin pa rnams ni go bar byed pa nyid yin par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags nyid bye brag ste khyad par de dag la yod pa'i spyi gang yin pa rnams ni go bar byed pa nyid yin par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The very sign, that is, the particulars that exist in those, the universals that are asserted to be what is to be understood.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /

analyzed: dngos po nyid 'ba' zhig nges pa na 'khrul pa ni du ba la brten pa ma yin no //

analyzed: gal te khyad par nye bar bkod na go bya rtogs pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa don med do zhe na /

original: bden te / 'dir 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir ni spyi nye bar bkod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bden te / 'dir 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir ni spyi nye bar bkod pa ma yin no //

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /

original: goms pa'i phyir na rtogs pa po 'ga' zhig mthong ba'i dngos po la yang dngos po 'di ni lus can no zhes kyang nges pa skye ba 'am /
analyzed: goms pa'i phyir na rtogs pa po 'ga' zhig mthong ba'i dngos po la yang dngos po 'di ni lus can no zhes kyang nges pa skye ba 'am /
translated: Because of habituation, some people who perceive a thing ascertain it as having a body,

original: yang na @256a * //
analyzed: yang na @256a * //
translated: Or else,üîΩüîΩ

original: rtogs pa po thams cad kyang mthong ba'i dngos po la spyi'i rnam par rtogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rtogs pa po thams cad kyang mthong ba'i dngos po la spyi'i rnam par rtogs par 'gyur la /

original: khyad par nges pa ni phyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par nges pa ni phyis 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de la nye bar gzung ba'i spyi gang yin pa de ni ma spangs pa nyid do //

analyzed: de'i phyir rtogs pa po'i zhen pa'i dor khyad par gyis zin pa'i spyi go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the universal that is understood is qualified by the particular that is the object of the conception of the cognizer.

original: khyad par 'khrul pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par 'khrul pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /

original: dper na 'di ni g-yor mo yin te /
analyzed: dper na 'di ni g-yor mo yin te /
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúThis is a cow,

analyzed: rtse mor bya tshang bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
translated: because a bird‚Äôs nest is built on its peak.‚Äù

analyzed: rtse mo nyid dang bya tshang bcas pa dag nye bar bkod pa ni so sor 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The peak and the building of the bird‚Äôs nest are adduced because they are individually mistaken.

analyzed: gang gi tshe khyad par rtogs par bya ba la spyi khyad par du ma byas pa sems pa la gnas par gyur na ni /
translated: When one is engaged in thinking about a universal without qualifying it as a particular,

analyzed: spyi de'i rang bzhin des dngos po la 'khrul par 'gyur ba'i phyir spyi de go bar byed pa nyid du mi 'dod do //

analyzed: mi 'khrul ba'i phyir 'bras bu go bar byed par 'gyur na /
translated: If it were the cause of understanding because it is non-mistaken,

analyzed: gal te yang du ba me las skyes pa de lta na yang de las skyes pa de lta na yang 'khrul pa med do zhes ga la yin zhe na /
translated: then how could it be that smoke is born from fire and yet is not mistaken with regard to that?

original: mi 'khrul pa'i rgyu bshad pa /
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa'i rgyu bshad pa /
translated: The explanation of the cause of non-mistakenness.

original: rgyu med de la 'khrul na ni 'bras bu 'di rgyu ldan pa las 'das par gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu med de la 'khrul na ni 'bras bu 'di rgyu ldan pa las 'das par gyur te /
translated: If it were mistaken with regard to that cause, which has no cause, then this effect would be beyond having a cause.

analyzed: me la 'khrul na ni du ba rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gang dag dmigs na zhes bya ba 'dis ni rgyu'i yul can gyi dmigs pa ston te ;

analyzed: sha za la sogs pa mi dmigs pa ni rgyu'i dngos po ma yin no //

original: mi dmigs pa gang dag dmigs na dmigs pa'i dngos po de ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa gang dag dmigs na dmigs pa'i dngos po de ni 'bras bu yin no //

original: de'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: gal te ma dmigs pa de ma dmigs pa'i dus su de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul yin no //

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gang zhig ma dmigs pas dmigs pa'i dngos po de ma dmigs pa'i dus su yang gal te yod na snang ba nyid du gyur na ni snang bar nges par nus pas de ltar na 'bras bur nges pa yin no //

analyzed: ma dmigs pa las dmigs pa na snang bar nges par nus pa de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is it that, when apprehended from non-apprehension, can be ascertained as manifest?

original: ma dmigs pa'i gnas skabs su yang snang ba'i sa phyogs de dang shes pa gcig la 'du ba nges par nus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ma dmigs pa'i gnas skabs su yang snang ba'i sa phyogs de dang shes pa gcig la 'du ba nges par nus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is that which, even at the time of non-apprehension, can be ascertained as being combined with the manifest place and cognition.

original: de ltar nges par nus pa de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar nges par nus pa de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is this certainty?

original: yul de nyid du rgyun skye bzhin par nges pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yul de nyid du rgyun skye bzhin par nges pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the certainty that the continuum is generated in that very object.

original: gal te 'di ni 'dir skyes pa yin @256b la ;
analyzed: gal te 'di ni 'dir skyes pa yin @256b la ;
translated: If this is generated here,

analyzed: 'di ni yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid nges pa med pa ma yin nam zhe na /

original: nges pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not uncertain.

analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa ni / gang la don 'di ni skye ba'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: The certainty of the relation of cause and effectüîΩis based on the fact that this has the nature of being generated,

analyzed: 'di ni skyes zin pa yin no zhes rnam par byed pa'i nus pa yod pa de'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and that is already generated.

original: gang zhig mthong ba'i rang bzhin skye bzhin pa dang / skyes zin pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed mi nus pa de ni bskyed bya nyid du mi shes pas na /
analyzed: gang zhig mthong ba'i rang bzhin skye bzhin pa dang / skyes zin pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed mi nus pa de ni bskyed bya nyid du mi shes pas na /
translated: One who is unable to distinguish the nature of that which is being generated from that which has already been generated cannot know the nature of that which is to be generated.

original: ji ltar bskyed bya skyed byed kyi ngo bo nges par byed /
analyzed: ji ltar bskyed bya skyed byed kyi ngo bo nges par byed /
translated: How can one ascertain the nature of that which is to be generated and that which generates it?

original: bskyed par bya ba nyid nges par shes na ni bskyed bya skyed byed kyi ngo bo nges par byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba nyid nges par shes na ni bskyed bya skyed byed kyi ngo bo nges par byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: If one definitely knows that it is to be generated, then one definitely makes the nature of the generator and the generated, but not otherwise.

original: des na bong bum rtogs pas gal te mi dmigs nas bong bu dmigs la /
analyzed: des na bong bum rtogs pas gal te mi dmigs nas bong bu dmigs la /
translated: Therefore, if one does not observe a donkey because of understanding a pot, one observes a pot.

original: me ma dmigs na yang skye bos bar du chod pas ma dmigs pa de lta na yang skyes bu des bong bu de nyid du skye bar mthong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: me ma dmigs na yang skye bos bar du chod pas ma dmigs pa de lta na yang skyes bu des bong bu de nyid du skye bar mthong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: And if one does not observe fire because of not observing smoke, one does not see that the person sees the donkey because of the obstruction of the person.

analyzed: 'on kyang skyes zin pa'i rang bzhin mig mngon du gtad ma thag tu dmigs pa yin no //

analyzed: des na dmigs pa'i sngon rol du ni des de snang ba'i sa phyogs dang shes pa gcig la 'du ba'i bltar rung ba nyid du ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, prior to observation, one does not ascertain that it is suitable to be seen in the place where it appears or in the same cognition.

analyzed: 'di ltar rnam pa de lta bu skyes zin pa dag ni yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa dag tu med pa nyid do //
translated: In this way, the already arisen aspects do not exist as coming from another place.

original: gang zhig dmigs pa'i sngon rol du rgyu gzhan dmigs pa na /
analyzed: gang zhig dmigs pa'i sngon rol du rgyu gzhan dmigs pa na /
translated: If one observes another cause prior to observation,

analyzed: mig mngon du phyogs pas yul gzhan du 'ongs pa srid pa bkag cing /
translated: The eye is directed toward the object, and it is impossible for it to come to another place.

original: mthong ba'i sa phyogs de nyid du rgyu dang ldan pa cig car ram rim gyis skye bzhin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba de nyid ni snang ba'i sa phyogs dang lhan cig dmigs pa'i sngon rol du shes pa gcig la 'du bar srid pa yin pas na de'i
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa phyogs de nyid du rgyu dang ldan pa cig car ram rim gyis skye bzhin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba de nyid ni snang ba'i sa phyogs dang lhan cig dmigs pa'i sngon rol du shes pa gcig la 'du bar srid pa yin pas na de'i
translated: The nature of the object that is arising either simultaneously or sequentially in the very place that is seen is impossible to be combined in a single cognition prior to the simultaneous observation of the object and the appearance of the place.

original: mtshan nyid du gyur pa mi dmigs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid du gyur pa mi dmigs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nonobservation of that nature becomes the characteristic of the object.

analyzed: des na rnam pa de lta bu'i yul la 'bras bu nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir 'khrul pa med do //
translated: Thus, because the object is understood to be the effect of that, there is no error.

original: gang yang mun khung du sgron ma dmigs na snga na med pa'i bum pa dmigs la /
analyzed: gang yang mun khung du sgron ma dmigs na snga na med pa'i bum pa dmigs la /
translated: Also, the statement ‚ÄúWhen a lamp is observed in a dark room, a previously unseen pot is observed,

analyzed: de la dmigs na ni de yang mi dmigs so zhes ji skad brjod pa de yang bsal ba yin te /
translated: but when that is observed, the lamp is not observed‚Äù is refuted.

original: 'di ltar der ni dmigs pa'i bum pa dmigs pa'i sngon rol du bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin du nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar der ni dmigs pa'i bum pa dmigs pa'i sngon rol du bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin du nges pa ma yin te /
translated: In this way, the pot that is the object of perception is not ascertained as a nature that is suitable to be seen prior to the perception,

original: skyes zin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba'i phyir dang / sgron ma nye ba'i sngon rol @257a * //
analyzed: skyes zin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba'i phyir dang / sgron ma nye ba'i sngon rol @257a * //
translated: because it is seen as a nature that has already arisen, and because prior to the lamp,

original: du shes pa gcig la du ba'i sa phyogs 'ga' yang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //üîΩgang gis de 'bras bu nyid du nges par 'gyur ba sgron ma dmigs pa na dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi 'gyur pa'i bum pa ma dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: du shes pa gcig la du ba'i sa phyogs 'ga' yang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro // gang gis de 'bras bu nyid du nges par 'gyur ba sgron ma dmigs pa na dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi 'gyur pa'i bum pa ma dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: in a single cognition, one does not see any place that is smoky.üîΩWhen the lamp is perceived, the pot that is the object of perception is not not perceived as the cause of perception, by which it would be ascertained as the effect.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di la ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma dmigs pas gang gi tshe med par nges pa de'i tshe de 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di la ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma dmigs pas gang gi tshe med par nges pa de'i tshe de 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yin no //
translated: In this case of cause and effect, when nonperception of the cause that has the character of the object of perception ascertains nonexistence, at that time it ascertains the effect.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po med par nges pa de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa ma dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po med par nges pa de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa ma dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin la /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of the nonexistence of a thing is preceded by the nonapprehension of the object‚Äôs presence, which is characterized by the object‚Äôs being present.

analyzed: gang gi tshe dmigs ba'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa nyid kyi 'bras bu de ma dmigs pa de'i tshe rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por nges pa yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: And when the effect of the object‚Äôs presence, which is characterized by the object‚Äôs being present, is not apprehended, then the relation of cause and effect is ascertained.

translated: Thus, there is one nonapprehension of the object‚Äôs presence, which is characterized by the object‚Äôs being present, prior to the apprehension of the effect; and there is another nonapprehension, which is preceded by the nonapprehension of the cause, later on.

original: de ltar mi dmigs pa gnyis dang dmigs pa gcig ni 'bras bu'i yul can yin la /
analyzed: de ltar mi dmigs pa gnyis dang dmigs pa gcig ni 'bras bu'i yul can yin la /

analyzed: rgyu'i yul can yang dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa gnyis yin no //
translated: And the cause as its object is also twofold: apprehension and nonapprehension.

original: de la dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad mdor bsdus nas rgyud pa 'bras bu'i dngos po sgrub par byed pa'i mngon sum dang mi dmigs par bshad pa yin no //

analyzed: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa'i sgrub par byed pa can gyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba de yang du ba la yod do //
translated: The effect that is established by perception and non-perception is present in smoke.

original: lan cig ste phyogs gcig de ltar zhes bya ba bskyed par bya ba nyid du mthong bas kyang du ba de me de'i 'bras bur zhes bya ba bskyed par bya bar 'grub ste /
analyzed: lan cig ste phyogs gcig de ltar zhes bya ba bskyed par bya ba nyid du mthong bas kyang du ba de me de'i 'bras bur zhes bya ba bskyed par bya bar 'grub ste /

analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni me shes la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The term ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the knowledge of fire, and so on.

original: me med kyang gtsub shing gtsubs pa dang me shel dang phrad pa tsam las kyang du ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: me med kyang gtsub shing gtsubs pa dang me shel dang phrad pa tsam las kyang du ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Even without fire, smoke arises merely from the contact of rubbing sticks together and the fire crystal.

original: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid dgag pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos so //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid dgag pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos so //
translated: In order to refute that it is not the effect of that, he says, ‚ÄúIt is not the case.‚Äù

original: bud shing gi 'gyur ba ni tshig ba nyid @257b de'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: bud shing gi 'gyur ba ni tshig ba nyid @257b de'i rgyu'o //
translated: The transformation of fuel is the cause of its burning.

original: 'dis ni 'bras bu'i khyad par bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'bras bu'i khyad par bstan to //
translated: This indicates the difference in the effect.

original: dro ba'i reg pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par ste /
analyzed: dro ba'i reg pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par ste /
translated: The difference in the quality of heat is the difference in nature.

original: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyis nye bar mtshon pa ni me yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyis nye bar mtshon pa ni me yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that fire is indicated by the difference in the effect and the difference in nature.

original: gtsub zhing gtsubs pa dang / me shel dang phrad pa der yang 'bras bu bud shing 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin reg pa'i khyad par yang yod pa yin na /
analyzed: gtsub zhing gtsubs pa dang / me shel dang phrad pa der yang 'bras bu bud shing 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin reg pa'i khyad par yang yod pa yin na /
translated: And in the case of the friction of the two sticks and the contact with the fire crystal, the effect is the transformation of the fuel and the special contact of the nature.

original: des na ji ltar me med pa yin /
analyzed: des na ji ltar me med pa yin /
translated: So how can there be no fire?

original: gzhan yang 'bras bu rgyu med par 'byung na ni rgyu med pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'bras bu rgyu med par 'byung na ni rgyu med pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, if the effect arises without a cause, it would be causeless.

original: mngon sum gyi yul la 'khrul pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi yul la 'khrul pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is the object of perception nondeceptive,

original: 'thad pas kyang 'khrul par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'thad pas kyang 'khrul par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: but it is also unreasonable to be deceived by reasoning. This is the meaning.

original: 'thad pa ston par byed pa ni gang zhig ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'thad pa ston par byed pa ni gang zhig ces bya ba yin no //
translated: The demonstration of reasoning is ‚Äúwhat.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu gang zhig skyed par byed pa'i dngos po gang med par 'byung ba'i dngos po de ni de'i rgyu can ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu gang zhig skyed par byed pa'i dngos po gang med par 'byung ba'i dngos po de ni de'i rgyu can ma yin no //
translated: Any effect that arises without the existence of any entity that is its cause is not caused by that.

original: de'i rgyu can nyid ni de la mi 'khrul pas khyab pa yin yang de dang 'gal ba ni 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i rgyu can nyid ni de la mi 'khrul pas khyab pa yin yang de dang 'gal ba ni 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: Because being caused by that is pervaded by being nondeceptive with respect to that, it is contradictory to that.

original: des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pas de'i rgyu can nyid bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pas de'i rgyu can nyid bkag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the presence of a contradictory pervasion is refuted by the observation of the presence of that.

original: du ba yang me med par 'byung ste zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi chos nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: du ba yang me med par 'byung ste zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi chos nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúSmoke occurs without fire‚Äù is the application of the property of the subject.
